1.verse: Yesu Kristo asefo - Yesu Kristo a ofi ɔhene Dawid ne Abraham abusua mu no mpanyimfo din na edidi so yi:

2.verse: Abraham ba ne Isak; Isak ba ne Yakob; Yakob nso mma ne Yuda ne ne nuanom.

3.verse: Yuda mma ne Peres ne Sera. Wɔn na ne Tamar. Peres ba ne Hesron, ɛnna Hesron nso ba ne Ram.

4.verse: Ram woo Aminadab; Aminadab woo Nahson. Nahson nso woo Salmon.

5.verse: Salmon ne ne yere Rahab woo Boas; Boas ne ne yere Rut woo Obed; Obed nso woo Yisai.

6.verse: Yisai ba ne ɔhene Dawid. Dawid ba ne Salomo. Dawid ne Bar-Seba a na anka ɔyɛ Uria yere no na wɔwoo Salomo.

7.verse: Salomo woo Rehaboam; Rehaboam woo Abia; Abia woo Asa.

8.verse: Asa woo Yehosafat; Yehosafat woo Yoram; Yoram nso woo Usia.

9.verse: Usia ba ne Yotam; Yotam ba ne Ahas; Ahas ba ne Hisikia.

10.verse: Hisikia ba ne Manase; Manase ba ne Amon; Amon nso ba ne Yosia.

11.verse: Yosia woo Yekonia ne ne nuanom. Wɔwoo wɔn bere a na Yudafo te nnomum mu wɔ Babilon no.

12.verse: Wofi Babilon nnomum mu bae no nso mu awo ntoatoaso ni: Yekonia woo Seatiel; Seatiel woo Serubabel.

13.verse: Serubabel woo Abihud; Abihud woo Eliakim; Eliakim nso woo Asor.

14.verse: Asor ba ne Sadok; Sadok ba ne Akim; Akim ba ne Elihud.

15.verse: Elihud ba ne Eleasar; Eleasar ba ne Matan. Matan nso ba ne Yakob;

16.verse: Yakob woo Yosef a ɔwaree Maria no. Saa Maria yi na ɔwoo Yesu Kristo.

17.verse: Awo ntoatoaso a efi Abraham so de besi ɔhene Dawid so yɛ dunan. Efi ɔhene Dawid so de besi bere a wɔfaa ɔman no nnomum kɔɔ Babilon no nso awo ntoatoaso yɛ dunan saa ara. Saa ara nso na efi bere a wotu fii Babilon san baa wɔn man mu bio no de besi Kristo awo so nso yɛ awo ntoatoaso dunan.

18.verse: Yesu awo - Afei Yesu Kristo awo ho nsɛm ni: Wɔde ne na Maria maa Yosef sɛ ɔnware no. Saa bere no, na Maria yɛ ɔbaabun, ɛne sɛ, na onnim ɔbarima. Nanso Maria nam Honhom Kronkron so nyinsɛnee.

19.verse: Ɛbaa saa no, ne kunu Yosef a odi ne ho ni no ampɛ sɛ obegu Maria anim ase nti, ɔyɛɛ n’adwene sɛ obegyaa no aware kokoam.

20.verse: Bere a asɛm no ayɛ Yosef dadwene no, Awurade bɔfo beyii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ no dae mu. Ɔbɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Yosef, Dawid aseni, nnyaa Maria aware, efisɛ, ne nyinsɛn no fi Honhom Kronkron.

21.verse: Ɔbɛwo ɔbabarima na woato ne din Yesu; ase ne Agyenkwa, efisɛ, ɔno na obegye ne nkurɔfo nkwa afi wɔn bɔne mu.”

22.verse: Eyi nyinaa baa mu de hyɛɛ nea odiyifo no kae no ma se:

23.verse: ”Ɔbaabun bi benyinsɛn na wawo ɔbabarima, na wɔato ne din, Immanuel,” a ase ne sɛ, “Onyankopɔn ne yɛn wɔ hɔ.”

24.verse: Bere a Yosef nyanee no, ɔyɛɛ sɛnea ɔbɔfo no hyɛɛ no sɛ ɔnyɛ no. Enti ɔkɔfaa ne yere Maria baa ne nkyɛn.

25.verse: Yosef ne Maria anhyia da kosii sɛ Maria woo ɔbabarima maa Yosef too ne din “Yesu”.

1.verse: Anyansafo a wofi apuei no - Bere a ɔhene Herode di ade no, na wɔwoo Yesu wɔ Betlehem a ɛwɔ Yudea.

2.verse: Saa bere no ara mu na anyansafo bi fi apuei baa Yerusalem bebisae se, “Ɛhe na Yudafo hene a wɔawo no no wɔ? Yehuu ne nsoromma wɔ apuei nohɔ, nti na yɛaba sɛ yɛrebɛsom no.”

3.verse: Ɔhene Herode tee saa asɛm yi no, ɛhaw n’adwene yiye. Saa ara nso na ɛhaw Yerusalemfo nyinaa adwene.

4.verse: Ɔhene Herode frɛɛ ɔman no mu asɔfo mpanyin ne kyerɛwsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfo behyiae. Obisaa wɔn se, “Adiyifo no kyerɛɛ faako a wɔbɛwo Kristo no anaa?”

5.verse: Wobuaa no se, “Betlehem a ɛwɔ Yudea. Na eyi ne nea adiyifo no kae:

6.verse: “‘O, kurow Betlehem, wo a wonyɛ ketewaa Yudaman mu, wo mu na meyi nea obedi me man Israel anim afi.’“

7.verse: Ɔhene Herode frɛɛ anyansafo no kokoam bisaa wɔn bere pɔtee a wohuu nsoromma no. Ɔtoaa so ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se,

8.verse: “Monkɔ Betlehem nkɔhwehwɛ abofra no. Sɛ muhu no a, mommɛka nkyerɛ me, na me nso menkɔsom no bi.”

9.verse: Anyansafo no tiee ɔhene no asɛm no wiei no, wɔkɔe. Wɔrekɔ no, nsoromma a wohuu wɔ apuei no san yii ne ho adi bio kyerɛɛ wɔn. Edii wɔn anim kosii faako a wɔawo abofra no wɔ Betlehem hɔ.

10.verse: Bere a wohuu nsoromma no no, wɔn ani gyee mmoroso.

11.verse: Woduu ofi a abofra no ne ne na Maria wɔ no, wɔkotow, som no. Wɔde wɔn akyɛde a ɛyɛ sikakɔkɔɔ, aduhuam ne kurobow yɛɛ no ayɛ.

12.verse: Onyankopɔn soo wɔn dae bɔɔ wɔn kɔkɔ sɛ wɔnnsan nnkɔ Herode nkyɛn bio wɔ Yerusalem. Enti wɔfaa ɔkwan foforo so kɔɔ wɔn kurom.

13.verse: Wɔbɔ wɔn ho aguaa kɔ Misraim - Anyansafo no kɔe akyi no, Awurade bɔfo soo Yosef dae se, “Sɔre fa abofra no ne ne na, na monkɔ Misraim nkɔtena hɔ nkosi sɛ mɛkyerɛ mo bere a mobɛsan aba. Efisɛ, ɔhene Herode rehwehwɛ abofra no akum no.”

14.verse: Anadwo no ara, Yosef faa abofra no ne Maria siim kɔɔ Misraim,

15.verse: na wɔtenaa hɔ kosii sɛ ɔhene Herode wui. Eyi na ɛmaa nea odiyifo no kae se, “Mafrɛ me ba afi Misraim” no baa mu.

16.verse: Betlehem mmofra no kum - Herode hui sɛ anyansafo no adaadaa no no, ne bo fuwii mmoroso. ɔsomaa n’asraafo sɛ wɔnkɔ Betlehem ne nkurow a atwa ho ahyia no nyinaa mu nkokunkum mmarimaa a wonnii mfe abien kosi wɔn a wɔadi mfe abien so, sɛnea anyansafo no bere a wɔkae se wɔwoo abofra no wɔ mu no kyerɛ no.

17.verse: Herode atirimmɔdensɛm yi maa nea odiyifo Yeremia kae se,

18.verse: “Wɔte nne bi wɔ Rama. Ɛyɛ osu ne agyaadwo; Rahel resu ne mma; ɔmpɛ awerɛkyekye bi, efisɛ, wɔnte ase bio” no baa mu.

19.verse: Wɔsan ba Nasaret - Herode wu akyi no, Awurade bɔfo yii ne ho adi kyerɛɛ Yosef wɔ dae mu wɔ Misraim ka kyerɛɛ no se,

20.verse: “Sɔre na fa abofra no ne ne na kɔ Israel asase so, efisɛ, wɔn a wɔpɛe sɛ wokum abofra no no awuwu.”

21.verse: Yosef faa abofra no ne ne na san kɔɔ Israel asase so bio.

22.verse: Yosef tee sɛ Arkelao a ɔyɛ Herode ba na odi hene wɔ Yudea saa bere no mu no, osuroe sɛ ɔbɛkɔ hɔ. Awurade san soo no dae foforo bio se ɔnnkɔ Yudea na mmom, ɔnkɔ Galilea.

23.verse: Enti wɔkɔtenaa kurow Nasaret mu. Eyi nso maa nea odiyifo no kae se, “Wɔbɔfrɛ no Nasaretni no baa mu.

1.verse: Yohane Osuboni asɛnka - Bere a Yesu ne n’awofo wɔ Nasaret no, Yohane Osuboni bɛkaa asɛm wɔ Yudea sare so se,

2.verse: “Monsakra mo su; momfa mo ho mma Onyankopɔn, na ɔsoro ahenni no abɛn.”

3.verse: Yohane ne nea odiyifo Yesaia kaa ne ho asɛm se, “Obi nne reteɛm se, ‘Mommɔ kwan mma Awurade; momma n’atempɔn nteɛ!’ “

4.verse: Saa bere no, na Yohane fura yoma ho nhwi ntama, bɔ aboa nhoma abɔso. Na n’aduan yɛ mmoadabi ne ɛwo.

5.verse: Yerusalemfo ne Yudeafo ne nnipa a wɔte Asubɔnten Yordan ho no nyinaa kɔɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ sare no so hɔ kotiee asɛm no bi.

6.verse: Wɔkaa wɔn bɔne ma ɔbɔɔ wɔn asu wɔ Asubɔnten Yordan mu.

7.verse: Yohane hui sɛ Farisifo ne Sadukifo pii reba ne nkyɛn ma wɔabɔ wɔn asu no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Awɔ mma! Hena na ɔka kyerɛɛ mo se munguan mfi Onyankopɔn abufuw a ɛreba no ano?

8.verse: Ansa na wɔbɛbɔ mo asu no, ɛsɛ sɛ mosakra mo su na mubu ɔbra pa.

9.verse: Munsusuw sɛ moyɛ Abraham asefo nti, mubetumi aguan afi asotwe a ɛbɛba mo so no ho. Merema mo ate ase sɛ Onyankopɔn betumi ama abo a ɛwɔ ha yi adan Abraham asefo.

10.verse: “Onyankopɔn de n’abonnua ato dua biara a ɛnsow aba pa ntini ho sɛ ɔde betwa, na ɔde agu gya mu ahyew no.

11.verse: “Me de, mede nsu na ɛrebɔ wɔn a wɔasakra wɔn su no asu. Nanso nea odi m’akyi reba no de, ɔso sen me, a ne mpaboa mpo, mensɛ sɛ mikita. Ɔno de, sɛ ɔba a, ɔde Honhom Kronkron ne ogya na ɛbɛbɔ mo asu.

12.verse: Obehuhuw aburow no so ayiyi mu aba pa no afi ntɛtɛ no mu, na ɔde aba pa no akosie, na ɔde ogya a ennum da ahyew ntɛtɛ no pasaa.”

13.verse: Yesu asubɔ - Yesu tee Yohane Osuboni nka no, ofi Galilea baa Asubɔnten Yordan ho sɛ Yohane mmɔ no asu.

14.verse: Yohane hui sɛ ɔmfata sɛ ɔbɔ Yesu asu. Eyi nti, ɔkae se, “Wo na ɛsɛ sɛ wobɔ me asu, na ɛnyɛ me.”

15.verse: Ɛnna Yesu nso ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Etwa ara na etwa sɛ wobɔ me asu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a nea Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ato hɔ no bɛba mu.” Yesu asɛm a ɔkae no nti, Yohane bɔɔ no asu.

16.verse: Yohane asubɔ no akyi a ofi nsu no mu baa koko so pɛ, ɔsoro bue maa no. Ohuu Onyankopɔn Honhom sɛ ɛresian ba no so sɛ aborɔnoma.

17.verse: Ɛhɔ ara, nne bi fi soro kae se, “Oyi ne me dɔ Ba a ɔsɔ m’ani.”

1.verse: Ɔbonsam sɔ Yesu hwɛ - Eyi akyi no, Honhom Kronkron faa Yesu kɔɔ sare so sɛ ɔbonsam nkɔsɔ no nhwɛ.

2.verse: Saa bere no, Yesu dii mmuada adaduanan, awia ne anadwo. Eyi maa ɔkɔm dee no.

3.verse: Ɔbonsam baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sɛ wone Onyankopɔn Ba no a, ka na saa abo yi nnan aduan.”

4.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Wɔakyerɛw sɛ, ‘Ɛnyɛ aduan nko ara na ɛho hia onipa wɔ n’asetena mu, na mmom nea ehia titiriw ne sɛ, obedi Onyankopɔn asɛm so.’ “

5.verse: Afei ɔbonsam de Yesu kɔɔ Yerusalem de no kogyinaa asɔredan a ɛwɔ hɔ no atifi pɛɛ,

6.verse: na ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sɛ wone Onyankopɔn ba no ampa ara a, huruw fi nea wugyinae hɔ si fam, efisɛ, wɔakyerɛw sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn bɛsoma n’abɔfo abɛsɔw wo na woammɛhwe abotan so.’ “

7.verse: Yesu buae bio se, “Wɔakyerɛw bio sɛ, ‘Nsɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn nhwɛ.’ “

8.verse: Eyi akyi no, ɔbonsam de Yesu kɔɔ bepɔw tenten bi mpampam. Ɔde n’ani kari kyerɛɛ no wiase ahenni ahorow ne emu anuonyam nyinaa.

9.verse: Afei ɔka kyerɛ Yesu se, “Sɛ wobɛkotow asom me a, mede nea wuhu yi nyinaa bɛma wo.”

10.verse: Ɛhɔ ara na Yesu buae se, “Fi me so, Satan! Wɔakyerɛw sɛ, ‘Kotow som Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, na ɔno nko ara na som no.’ “

11.verse: Yesu ano sii no, ɔbonsam gyaw no hɔ kɔe. Ɛno akyi, abɔfo baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛsom no.

12.verse: Yesu fiti n’adwuma ase wɔ Galilea - Yesu tee sɛ wɔakyere Yohane no, ɔkɔɔ Galilea.

13.verse: Oduu Galilea no, wantena Nasaret, na mmom, otwaam wɔ Nasaret hɔ kɔtenaa Kapernaum a ɛwɔ Galilea mpoano no, Sebulon ne Naftali ahye so.

14.verse: Eyi maa nea odiyifo Elia kae se,

15.verse: “Sebulon asase ne Naftali asase, ɔkwan a ɛkɔ po mu, Yordan agya, amanaman Galilea,

16.verse: nnipa a wɔtenaa sum mu no, Hann kɛse bi apue ama wɔn. Wɔtenaa owu asase so maa Hann no pue maa wɔn wɔ hɔ” no baa mu.

17.verse: Efi saa bere no, Yesu fii n’asɛnka ase se, “Monsakra mo su, momfa mo ho mma Onyankopɔn, na ɔsoro ahenni no abɛn.”

18.verse: Yesu frɛ asuafo baanan - Da bi a Yesu nam Galilea mpoano no, ohuu anuanom baanu bi a wɔn nyinaa yɛ apofofo sɛ wɔregu asau wɔ po no mu. Saa anuanom yi mu baako din de Simon, a ne din foforo nso de Petro. Ɔbaako no nso din de Andrea.

19.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mummedi m’akyi, na mɛkyerɛ mo ɔkwan a wɔfa so yi nnipa kra.”

20.verse: Ɛhɔ ara, wogyaw wɔn asau no guu hɔ bedii n’akyi ne no kɔe.

21.verse: Ɔkɔɔ n’anim kakra no, ohuu Sebedeo mma baanu a wɔfrɛ ɔbaako Yohane, ɛnna ɔbaako nso din de Yakobo, sɛ wɔne wɔn agya te ɔkorow mu retuatua wɔn asau mu. Yesu frɛɛ wɔn nso sɛ wommedi n’akyi.

22.verse: Ntɛm ara, wogyaw wɔn agya ne ɔkorow no hɔ, bedii n’akyi.

23.verse: Galilea asɛnka ne ayaresa - Yesu kyinkyinii Galileaman mu nyinaa kaa ahenni no ho asɛmpa wɔ Yudafo hyiadan mu. Ɔsaa nyarewa ahorow a wɔde baa n’anim nyinaa nso.

24.verse: Yesu anwonwade a ɔyɛe yi trɛw koduu Siriaman mu nyinaa. Eyi ma wɔde wɔn a ahonhommɔne wɔ wɔn so, wɔn a wotwa, wɔn a wɔyare mmubui, ne wɔn a nyarewa ahorow haw wɔn no nyinaa fi Siriaman mu brɛɛ no ma ɔsaa wɔn nyinaa yare.

25.verse: Anwonwade a Yesu yɛe yi, maa nnipakuw a wofi Galilea ne Nkurow Du ‘Dekapoli’ no mu ne Yerusalem ne Yordan agya tu dii n’akyi.

1.verse: Nhyira nsɛm - Yesu huu nnipakuw no saa no, ɔkɔɔ bepɔw bi so. Ɔtenaa ase no, n’asuafo no kɔɔ ne nkyɛn.

2.verse: Ofitii ase kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn se,

3.verse: “Nhyira ne wɔn a wonim sɛ wɔyɛ ahiafo wɔ honhom mu, na wɔn na ɔsoro ahenni yɛ wɔn dea.

4.verse: Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔn werɛ ahow, na wɔn na Onyankopɔn bɛkyekye wɔn werɛ.

5.verse: Nhyira ne ahobrɛasefo, na wɔn na Onyankopɔn bɛma wɔadi asase so.

6.verse: “Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔn pɛ ne sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Onyankopɔn apɛde, na wɔn na Onyankopɔn bɛma wɔn nea ehia wɔn.

7.verse: Nhyira ne wɔn a wohu mmɔbɔ, na wɔn na Onyankopɔn behu wɔn mmɔbɔ.

8.verse: Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔn koma mu tew, na wɔn na wɔbehu Onyankopɔn.

9.verse: Nhyira ne apatafo, na wɔn na Onyankopɔn bɛfrɛ wɔn ne mma.

10.verse: Nhyira ne wɔn a esiane sɛ wɔyɛ Onyankopɔn apɛde nti wɔtaa wɔn, na wɔn na ɔsoro ahenni no yɛ wɔn dea.

11.verse: “Nhyira ne mo a me din mu nti, wɔyaw mo, taa mo, twa atoro, ka asɛmmɔne to mo so.

12.verse: Momma mo ani nnye na monsɛpɛw mo ho efisɛ, mowɔ akatua a ɛso wɔ ɔsoro. Munhu sɛ saa ara na wɔtaa adiyifo a wɔdii mo kan no.

13.verse: Nkyene ne kanea - “Mone asase yi so nkyene. Sɛ nkyene dɛ yera a, ɔkwan bɛn so na wɔbɛfa ama ayɛ nkyene bio? Enye mma hwee bio, gye sɛ wohwie gu na nnipa tiatia so.

14.verse: Mone wiase kanea. Kurow a ɛda bepɔw so no ntumi nhintaw.

15.verse: Wɔnsɔ kanea mfa nsie, na mmom, wɔde si petee mu na ahyerɛn ama wɔn a wɔwɔ ofi no mu no nyinaa.

16.verse: Saa ara na momma mo nneyɛe pa nna adi mma nnipa nhu na wɔnam so ahyɛ mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no anuonyam.

17.verse: Mmara no mu denhyɛ - “Munnsusuw sɛ maba sɛ merebɛsɛe Mose mmara no ne adiyifo no nkyerɛkyerɛ no. Na mmom, maba sɛ, merebɛhyɛ no ma, sɛnea ne nyinaa bɛba mu pɛpɛɛpɛ.

18.verse: Munhu sɛ, ɔsoro ne asase da so wɔ hɔ yi, mmara no mu biribiara rensakra da kosi sɛ ne nyinaa bɛba mu.

19.verse: Eyi nti, obiara a obebu mmara no mu fa bi so, na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ afoforo ama wɔn nso abu mmara no mu fa bi so no, bɛyɛ akumaa ɔsoro ahenni mu. Na obiara a obedi mmara no so na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ afoforo ama wɔn nso adi mmara no so no, bɛyɛ kɛse ɔsoro ahenni mu.

20.verse: “Enti merebɔ mo kɔkɔ sɛ, sɛ mopɛ sɛ mokɔ ɔsoro ahenni mu de a, gye sɛ moyɛ Onyankopɔn apɛde sen nea mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo ne Farisifo no yɛ no.

21.verse: Abufuw ho mmara - “Mose mmara no ka se, ‘Nea odi awu no, ɔno nso ɛsɛ sɛ wokum no bi.’

22.verse: Na me de, nea mereka ne sɛ, obiara a ne bo befuw ne nua no, wobebu no atɛn. Bio, obiara a ɔbɛyaw ne nua no, wɔbɛfrɛ no mpanyin anim. Afei obiara a ɔbɛka akyerɛ ne nua se ‘Ogyimifo’ no, ɔbɛkɔ amanehunu gya mu.

23.verse: “Enti sɛ ɛba sɛ worekɔbɔ afɔre, na wokae sɛ wo ne wo nua wɔ asɛm a,

24.verse: gyae afɔre no bɔ na kɔ, na wo ne wo nua no nkɔbom ansa na woakɔbɔ afɔre no.

25.verse: Sɛ wo ne obi nya asɛm a, wo ne no mmɔ mu ntɛm na wamfa wo ankɔ asennii ankɔma ɔtemmufo na ɔtemmufo no amfa wo anhyɛ afiasehwɛfo nsa, na afiasehwɛfo no amfa wo ankɔto afiase.

26.verse: Sɛ ɔde wo kɔ ɔtemmufo anim a, kae sɛ, ansa na wubefi asennii hɔ no, gye sɛ woatua sika biara a wɔregye afi wo hɔ no.

27.verse: Aguamammɔ - “Mose mmara no ka se, ‘Nsɛe aware.’

28.verse: Na me de, nea mereka ne sɛ: Obiara a ohu ɔbea na ne kɔn dɔ no ne koma mu no, abɔ aguaman.

29.verse: Sɛ w’ani baako a eye to wo hintidua a, eye sɛ wubetu atow akyene. Efisɛ, eye sɛ wobɛhwere w’akwaa fa bi sen sɛ wɔbɛtow wo nipadua no nyinaa akyene amanehunu gya mu.

30.verse: Saa ara nso na sɛ wo nsa a eye to wo hintidua a, eye sɛ wubetwa atow akyene, efisɛ, eye sɛ wobɛhwere w’akwaa fa bi sen sɛ wɔbɛtow wo nipadua nyinaa akyene amanehunu gya mu.

31.verse: Awaregyae - “Mose mmara no ka se, ‘Obiara a obegyaa ne yere no mma no awaregyae krataa.’

32.verse: Na me de , nea mereka ne sɛ, sɛ ɔbarima bi gyaa ne yere a, ɛnyɛ sɛ ɔbea no abɔ aguaman, na ɔbea no san kɔware bio a, na ɔbarima a ogyaa no no ama ɔbea no asɛe aware. Ɔbarima foforo a ɔbɛware ɔbea no nso asɛe aware saa ara.

33.verse: Ɔkasa mu nokwaredi - “Bio, Mose mmara no ka se, ‘Mmu bɔ a woahyɛ Onyankopɔn no so, na mmom di bɔ a woahyɛ no no so.’

34.verse: Na me de, nea mereka ne sɛ: Monnka ntam mmfa nnhyɛ bɔ. Monnnɔ soro, efisɛ, ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn ahengua.

35.verse: Monnnɔ fam, efisɛ, ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn nan ase agua. Monnnɔ Yerusalem, efisɛ, ɛyɛ ahenkurow.

36.verse: Mfa wo ti nka ntam, efisɛ, worentumi nnan tinhwi baako mpo mma ɛnyɛ fitaa anaa tuntum.

37.verse: Momma mo nsɛm nyɛ ‘Yiw’ anaa ‘Dabi’. Asɛm biara a wobɛka a ɛnyɛ ‘Yiw’ anaa ‘Dabi’ no fi ɔbonsam.

38.verse: Aweretɔ - “Mose mmara no ka se, ‘Sɛ obi tu w’aniwa a, tu ne de bi. Sɛ obi tu wo se nso a, tu ne de bi.’

39.verse: Na me de, nea mereka ne sɛ: Mommfa bɔne nntua bɔne so ka! Sɛ obi bɔ w’aso nifa mu a, dan benkum no nso ma no na ɔmmɔ mu.

40.verse: Sɛ obi ne wo di asɛm gye wo ntama a, worɔw wo mpaboa ka ho ma no.

41.verse: Sɛ obi hyɛ wo se wo ne no nnantew kwansin baako a, wo ne no nkɔ akwansin abien.

42.verse: Sɛ obi srɛ wo biribi a, fa ma no; obi pɛ sɛ ɔfɛm wo hɔ biribi a, fa fɛm no.

43.verse: Dɔ w’atamfo - “Moate sɛ wɔka se, ‘Dɔ wo yɔnko na tan wo tamfo.’

44.verse: Na me de, nea mereka ne sɛ: Mommɔ mpae mma wɔn a wɔhaw mo.

45.verse: Eyi bɛma mo ayɛ mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no mma, efisɛ, ɔma ne wia pue, ma ne su tɔ ma nnipa bɔne ne nnipa pa nyinaa pɛ.

46.verse: Sɛ modɔ wɔn a wɔdɔ mo no nko ara a, mfaso bɛn na mubenya afi Onyankopɔn nkyɛn? Ɛnyɛ saa ara na nnebɔneyɛfo nso yɛ?

47.verse: Sɛ mukyia wɔn a munim wɔn nko ara a, nsonoe bɛn na ɛda mo ne afoforo ntam? Ɛnyɛ saa ara na nnebɔneyɛfo nso yɛ?

48.verse: Enti monyɛ pɛ sɛnea mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no yɛ pɛ no.

1.verse: Papayɛ ho kɔkɔbɔ - “Monhwɛ yiye na moanyɛ papa ankyerɛ nnipa amfa ampɛ anuonyam. Sɛ moyɛ saa a, morenya mfaso biara mfi mo Agya a ɔwɔ soro no nkyɛn.

2.verse: Sɛ woyɛ papa a, mmɔ no dawuru sɛnea wɔn a wɔyɛ huuhuu yɛ wɔ asɔredan mu ne mmɔnten so no. Merema mo ate ase sɛ, saa nnipa no anya wɔn akatua dedaw.

3.verse: Sɛ woyɛ papa a, mma obiara nnhu. Mpo sɛ wode wo nsa nifa yɛ papa a, mma wo nsa benkum nnhu,

4.verse: na w’agya a onim kokoam nsɛm nyinaa no betua wo ka.

5.verse: Mpaebɔ ho kɔkɔbɔ - “Ɛfa mpaebɔ ho nso, sɛ morebɔ mpae a, mommmɔ mpae sɛnea wɔn a wɔyɛ huuhuu gyina asɔredan mu ne mmɔnten so bɔ mpae de pɛ nnipa anim anuonyam no. Merema mo ate ase sɛ, saa nnipa no anya wɔn akatua dedaw.

6.verse: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wobɔ mpae a, kowura wo dan mu, na to wo pon mu, na bɔ w’agya a ɔwɔ kokoam no mpae, na w’agya a onim kokoam nsɛm no, betua wo ka.

7.verse: “Sɛ mobɔ mpae a, monnkasakasa bebree, ntitititi nsɛm mu, nnsusuw sɛ, sɛ moyɛ saa a na Onyankopɔn betie mo.

8.verse: Mo agya Nyankopɔn nim nea ehia mo nyinaa ansa na mubisa no.

9.verse: “Enti saa ɔkwan yi so na momfa mmɔ mpae: ‘Yɛn Agya a wowɔ soro, wo din ho ntew.

10.verse: W’ahenni mmra. Nea wopɛ nyɛ asase so, sɛnea ɛyɛ ɔsoro.

11.verse: Ma yɛn, yɛn daa aduan nnɛ,

12.verse: na fa yɛn aka firi yɛn, sɛnea yɛde firi wɔn a wɔde yɛn aka.

13.verse: Mfa yɛn nkɔ sɔhwɛ mu. Na yi yɛn fi ɔbɔnefo no nsam. Amen.”

14.verse: Sɛ mode wɔn a wɔfom mo mfomso firi wɔn a, mo nso mo soro agya de mo mfomso befiri mo.

15.verse: Nanso, sɛ moamfa wɔn a wɔfom mo mfomso amfiri wɔn a, mo soro agya no nso remfa mo mfomso mfiri mo.

16.verse: Mmuadadi ho kɔkɔbɔ - “Sɛ mudi mmuada a, monnyɛ mo anim mmɔbɔmmɔbɔ, sɛnea nyaatwomfo di mmuada a wɔyɛ de pɛ nnipa anim anuonyam no. Merema mo ate ase sɛ, saa nnipa no anya wɔn akatua dedaw.

17.verse: Sɛ wudi mmuada a, srɛn wo ti, na hohoro w’anim, na ma w’anim nyɛ frɔmm,

18.verse: na mma nnipa nnhu sɛ woredi mmuada, gye w’agya a ohu nea wɔyɛ wɔ kokoam nyinaa no; na w’agya a ohu nea wɔyɛ wɔ kokoam nyinaa no betua wo ka.

19.verse: “Monnhyehyɛ mo agyapade wɔ asase yi so nea ntɛferɛw betumi awe, na ebetumi agye nkanare asɛe, na akorɔmfo betumi awia.

20.verse: Mmom, monhyehyɛ mo agyapade wɔ soro, nea ntɛferɛw ntumi nwe, na entumi nnye nkanare nsɛe, na akorɔmfo ntumi nwia.

21.verse: Na nea w’ademude wɔ no, ɛhɔ na wo koma nso wɔ.

22.verse: “Aniwa yɛ onipa kanea. Ɛno nti sɛ w’aniwa ye a, na wo nipadua nyinaa yɛ hann.

23.verse: Nanso, sɛ w’aniwa nye a, ɛma wo nipadua no nyinaa dan sum tumm. Enti sɛ hann a ɛwɔ wo mu no yɛ sum de a, na wo nipadua no yɛ sum kabii.

24.verse: “Obiara ntumi nsom awuranom baanu; sɛ ɔyɛ saa a, ɔbɛtan ɔbaako na wadɔ ɔbaako; anaasɛ ɔde ne ho bɛfam ɔbaako na wabu ɔbaako animtia. Morentumi nsom Onyankopɔn ne ahode.

25.verse: “Eyi nti na mitu mo fo sɛ, munnnwinnwen nea mubedi, anaa nea mobɛnom, anaa nea mubefura ho. Mowɔ ɔkra ne nipadua a ɛsom bo sen nea mubedi, nea mobɛnom, ne nea mubefura.

26.verse: Monhwɛ wim nnomaa, wonnua aba, ɛnna wontwa aba mmoaboa ano mfa nsie, nanso mo agya a ɔwɔ soro no ma wɔn aduan di. Monsom bo nsen wɔn anaa?

27.verse: Mo mu hena na adwene a odwen no betumi ato ne nkwanna so simma baako?

28.verse: “Adɛn nti na mudwinnwen ntama ho? Monhwɛ afifide bi sɛ wuram nhwiren. Wonnwen ntama ho.

29.verse: Nanso, ɔhene Salomo ahonya ne n’anuonyam nyinaa akyi no, na n’ahoɔfɛ nnu wuram nhwiren yi.

30.verse: Na sɛ Onyankopɔn tumi fura afifide a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ na ɔkyena enni hɔ ntama a, mo a mo gyidi sua, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na ɔrentumi mma mo nea ehia mo?

31.verse: “Enti ɛnsɛ sɛ mudwinnwen aduan ne ntama ho, sɛ wɔn a wɔn gyidi sua. Wɔn a wɔn gyidi sua no na bere biara wodwen saa nneɛma no ho.

32.verse: Na mo de, mo agya a ɔwɔ soro no nim sɛ eyinom nyinaa ho hia mo.

33.verse: Enti monhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn ahenni ne ne trenee kan, na ɔde nea ehia mo nyinaa bɛka mo ho.

34.verse: “Enti munnnwinnwen ɔkyena ho. Onyankopɔn no ara de nea ehia mo bɛma mo. Ɛda biara ne mu nsɛm.

1.verse: Anyansafo a wofi apuei no - “Mummmu ntɛn, na afoforo ammu mo ntɛn.

2.verse: Nea mode yɛ afoforo no, ɛno ara na wɔde bɛyɛ mo.

3.verse: Adɛn na woma ɔbo ketewaa a ɛda wo nua ani so no haw wo, bere a ɔbo kɛse da wo de so?

4.verse: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na woatumi aka akyerɛ wo nua se, ‘Ma minyi bosea a ɛda w’ani so no mma wo,’ wɔ bere a, ɔbo kɛse da w’ani so?

5.verse: Onipa huuhuu: Di kan yi ɔbo a ɛda w’ani so no ansa na woatumi ahu wo nua de ayi ama no.

6.verse: “Mommfa nea ɛho tew mma akraman. Saa ara na monntow mo nhene pa ngu mprako anim! Wobetiatia so na wɔadan wɔn ho atow ahyɛ mo so.

7.verse: Bisa, hwehwɛ, pem - “Mummisa, na wɔbɛma mo; monhwehwɛ, na mubehu; mompem, na wobebue mo.

8.verse: Na obiara a obisa no, onya. Obiara a ɔhwehwɛ no, ohu; na nea ɔpem no, wobue no.

9.verse: Na hena na ne ba bisa no abodoo a, ɔbɛma no ɔbo?

10.verse: Anaasɛ obisa no nsumnam a, ɔbɛma no ɔwɔ? Ɛremma saa da!

11.verse: Na sɛ mo a, mo koma yɛ den a moyɛ nnebɔneyɛfo mpo nim sɛnea moma mo mma nnepa a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mo agya a ɔwɔ soro no mfa nnepa mma ne mma a wobisa no no?

12.verse: “Enti sɛnea mmara no ne adiyifo no ka no, ade biara a mopɛ sɛ nnipa nyɛ mma mo no, mo nso monyɛ mma wɔn saa ara.

13.verse: Ɔkwan hihiaa no - “Ɔkwan hihiaa no nko ara so na wubetumi afa akɔ soro! Ɔkwan a ɛkɔ ɔbonsam kurom no so trɛw, na n’apon nso mu bae ma nnipadɔm a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔfa so kɔ ɔsɛe mu no.

14.verse: Ɔpon a wowura mu de kɔ nkwa mu no yɛ ketewaa, na ɔkwan a wɔfa so no nso yɛ teaa, na nnipa kakraa bi na wohu fa so.

15.verse: “Monhwɛ mo ho yiye wɔ atoro akyerɛkyerɛfo a wɔba mo nkyɛn ahobrɛase mu sɛ nguan, nanso wɔyɛ mpataku a wonya mo a, wɔbɛtetew mo pasaa no ho.

16.verse: Wɔn nneyɛe na mode behu wɔn, sɛnea mutumi de dua bi aba hu dua ko a ɛyɛ no. Worentumi mfa kokora nyɛ bayerɛ; saa ara nso na worentumi mfa kwaeborɔfere nyɛ borɔfere.

17.verse: Dua a ɛwɔ nnyinaso pa no tumi sow aba pa; na dua a enni nnyinaso pa no nso sow aba bɔne.

18.verse: Dua a ɛwɔ ahoɔden no ntumi nsow aba a enye, ɛnna dua a enni ahoɔden no nso ntumi nsow aba a eye.

19.verse: Dua biara a ɛnsow aba pa no, wotwa, de gu gya mu, hyew.

20.verse: Onipa nneyɛe na ɛma yehu ne suban. Saa ara nso na dua bi aba a ɛsow no na ɛma yɛde hu sɛ ɛyɛ dua pa anaa dua bɔne.

21.verse: “Ɛnyɛ obiara a ɔbɔ me din ‘Awurade,’ ‘Awurade’, no na ɔbɛkɔ ɔsoro ahenni mu.

22.verse: Atemmu da no, nnipa pii bɛka akyerɛ me se, ‘Awurade, yɛkaa wo ho asɛm kyerɛɛ afoforo. Yɛnam wo din nso so tuu ahonhommɔne, san yɛɛ anwonwade ahorow.’

23.verse: Na mabua wɔn se, ‘Minhuu mo da, na minnim mo nso. Nnebɔneyɛfo, mumfi ha nkɔ!’

24.verse: “Wɔn a wotie nea meka, na wodi so no te sɛ onyansafo a osi ne dan si ɔbotan so.

25.verse: Sɛ osu tɔ, na osuframa bɔ, na nsu yiri, na emu biara ka ɔdan no a, ɛremmu da, efisɛ, wosi sii ɔbotan so.

26.verse: “Nanso wɔn a wotie nea meka na wonni so no yɛ nkwaseafo. Wɔte sɛ obi a osii ne dan sii anhwea so.

27.verse: Sɛ osu tɔ, na osuframa bɔ, na nsu yiri, na emu biara ka ɔdan no a, ebedwiriw agu fam abubu pasaa.”

28.verse: Yesu asɛnka no maa nnipadɔm a wotiee no no nyinaa ho dwiriw wɔn,

29.verse: efisɛ, ɔkyerɛkyerɛe sɛ obi a okita tumi, na ɛnyɛ nea mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no kyerɛ no.

1.verse: Yesu sa nyarewa - Bere a Yesu sianee bepɔw no no, nnipadɔm bebree dii n’akyi.

2.verse: Ɔkwatani bi baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛkotow no, srɛɛ no sɛ, “Me wura, mesrɛ wo, sɛ ɛyɛ wopɛ a, sa me yare.”

3.verse: Yesu teɛɛ ne nsa de kaa ɔkwatani no kae se, “Mɛsa wo yare. Kwata, fi ne so kɔ!” Amonom hɔ ara, kwata no fii ne ho.

4.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Wo ne obiara nni w’ayaresa yi ho nkɔmmɔ. Kɔ, na fa wo ho kɔkyerɛ ɔsɔfo, na bɔ afɔre a Mose hyɛɛ sɛ wɔmmɔ sɛ adanse no.”

5.verse: Yesu kɔɔ Kapernaum. Oduu hɔ no, Roma asraafo panyin bi a dɔm hyɛ n’ase baa ne nkyɛn bebuu no nkotodwe kae se,

6.verse: “Awurade, m’abofra abubu gu hɔ a ɔrehu amane; mesrɛ wo, bɛsa no yare ma me.”

7.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Mɛba abɛsa no yare.”

8.verse: Asraafo panyin no tee Yesu asɛm a ɔkae no, ɔkae se, “Awurade, memfata sɛ woba me fi. Ka biribi, na m’abofra no ho bɛyɛ no den.

9.verse: Meyɛ ɔsraani a mehyɛ tumi ase, na mesan wɔ asraafo a wɔhyɛ m’ase. Meka kyerɛ wɔn mu bi se ɔnkɔ a, ɔkɔ. Meka kyerɛ ɔfoforo se ɔmmra a, ɔba. Saa ara nso na sɛ meka kyerɛ m’abofra se ɔnyɛ biribi a, ɔyɛ ara nen. Nanso minim sɛ, wowɔ tumi a wubetumi de apam ɔyare no ma afi ne so.”

10.verse: Yesu tee saa asɛm yi no, ɛyɛɛ no nwonwa. Ɔdanee n’ani ka kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm a wodi n’akyi no se, “Israelman mu nyinaa, minhuu gyidi a ɛte sɛɛ da.

11.verse: Na meka makyerɛ mo se, nnipa pii befi apuei ne atɔe aba, na wɔne Abraham, Isak ne Yakob abɛtena ase wɔ ɔsoro ahenni no mu.

12.verse: Na Israelfo a wosiesiee ɔsoro ahenni maa wɔn no mu pii wɔ hɔ a wɔbɛtow wɔn agu esum kabii mu ama yaw.”

13.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ asraafo panyin no se, “Kɔ fie. Nea wugye di no aba mu ama wo!” Saa bere koro no ara mu, abofra no ho tɔɔ no!

14.verse: Yesu sa Petro ase yare - Yesu kɔɔ Petro fi. Ɔkɔtoo sɛ atiridii abɔ Petro ase bea ma ɔda hɔ.

15.verse: Yesu soo ne nsa, na amonom, atiridii no tu fii ne so. Ɔsɔre noaa aduan maa wɔn.

16.verse: Saa da no anwummere no, wɔde wɔn a wɔwɔ ahohommɔne bebree brɛɛ Yesu. N’anom asɛm a ɔkae no maa ahohommɔne no nyinaa tu yerae, na wɔn a wɔyare no nyinaa nso ho tɔɔ wɔn.

17.verse: Eyi maa nea Odiyifo Yesaia kae se, “Ɔfaa yɛn ahoɔmmerɛw na ɔsoaa yɛn nyarewa nyinaa” no baa mu.

18.verse: Yesu akyidi - Yesu hui sɛ dɔm no redɔɔso no, ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, wonsiesie wɔn ho na wontwa nkɔ asuogya nohɔ.

19.verse: Ɛhɔ ara, Yudani kyerɛkyerɛfo bi ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo, baabiara a wobɛkɔ no, medi w’akyi!”

20.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Sakraman wɔ ntokuru, wim nnomaa nso wɔ birebuw, nanso me, Onipa Ba no de, minni baabi a mede me ti to!”

21.verse: Asuafo no mu baako bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Owura, ma me kwan na menkosie m’agya ansa na mabedi w’akyi.”

22.verse: Nanso Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Di m’akyi. Wɔn a wɔawu wɔ honhom mu no, nsie wɔn awufo.”

23.verse: Yesu brɛ ahum ase - Yesu saa nyarewa no wiei no, ɔtenaa ɔkorow mu ne n’asuafo no twa kɔɔ asuogya nohɔ.

24.verse: Prɛko pɛ, ahum kɛse bi tui maa asorɔkye bu bɛkɛtaa ɔkorow no so. Nanso na Yesu de, wada.

25.verse: N’asuafo no de nteɛteɛm kɔɔ ne nkyɛn konyanee no kae se, “Awurade! Gye yɛn na yɛreyɛ amem!”

26.verse: Yesu nyanee no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mo a mo gyidi sua. Adɛn na moabɔ hu saa?” Ɛhɔ ara, ɔsɔre teɛteɛɛ ahum ne asorɔkye no ma ɛyɛɛ dinn.

27.verse: Asuafo no ho dwiriw wɔn yiye. Wobisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho se, “Onipa bɛn mpo ni a ahum ne ɛpo tie no yi?”

28.verse: Yesu tu ahohommɔne - Yesu ne n’asuafo no duu asuogya wɔ Gadarafo asase so no, nnipa baanu bi a ahohommɔne wɔ wɔn so fi amusiei behyiaa no. Esiane sɛ na saa nnipa yi yɛ keka nti, na obiara ntumi mfa faako a wɔwɔ hɔ.

29.verse: Wohuu no pɛ, wofitii ase teɛteɛɛm se, “Onyankopɔn Ba, ɛdɛn na worehwehwɛ afi yɛn nkyɛn? Wunni ho kwan sɛ saa bere yi mu, woyɛ yɛn ayayade biara.”

30.verse: Saa bere koro no ara mu, na mprako redidi wɔ nkyɛn baabi.

31.verse: Ahohommɔne no srɛɛ Yesu sɛ, “Sɛ wutu yɛn a, fa yɛn kɔhyɛ mprako yi mu.”

32.verse: Yesu teɛɛ wɔn se, “Mumfi!” Ɛhɔ ara, ahonhommɔne no fii nnipa no mu kɔhyɛn mprako no mu. Mprakokuw no nyinaa de mmirika sianee bepɔw no koguu po no mu ma ɛfaa wɔn.

33.verse: Ntɛm ara, wɔn a wɔhwɛ mprako no so no tuu mmirika kɔɔ kurom kɔkaa nea asi no kyerɛɛ nkurɔfo.

34.verse: Kurom hɔfo no tee nea aba no, wɔbɔɔ twi kɔɔ nea Yesu wɔ hɔ no. Wohuu Yesu no, wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ omfi wɔn man mu hɔ nkɔ.

1.verse: Obubuafo bi ayaresa - Eyi akyi no, Yesu kɔtenaa ɔkorow bi mu kɔɔ Kapernaum, ne man mu.

2.verse: Oduu hɔ no, ankyɛ biara na nnipa bi de obubuafo bi brɛɛ no sɛ ɔnsa no yare. Na Yesu huu gyidi a wɔwɔ wɔ ne mu no, ɔka kyerɛɛ obubuafo no se, “Ɔba, ma w’ani nnye, mede wo bɔne nyinaa akyɛ wo.”

3.verse: Ɛhɔ ara na mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo a na wɔwɔ hɔ no bi teɛɛm se, “Ɔbarima yi ka abususɛm. Ɔkyerɛ sɛ ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn!”

4.verse: Yesu huu nea ɛwɔ wɔn adwene mu no, obisaa wɔn se, “Adɛn nti na mudwen bɔne ho saa?

5.verse: Me, Onipa Ba no, mewɔ tumi wɔ asase yi so sɛ mitumi de bɔne kyɛ. Nea ɛwɔ he na ɛyɛ den, sɛ obi bɛka se, ‘Mede wo bɔne akyɛ wo,’ anaasɛ ɔbɛka se, ‘Sɔre na nantew?”

6.verse: Afei ɔdanee n’ani ka kyerɛɛ obubuafo no se, “Sɔre, na bobɔw wo kɛtɛ, na kɔ fie, efisɛ, masa wo yare.”

7.verse: Amonom hɔ ara, obubuafo no sɔre bobɔw ne kɛtɛ siim kɔɔ ne fi!

8.verse: Nnipadɔm no huu anwonwade yi no, wɔn ho dwiriw wɔn yiye. Wɔkamfoo Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔde tumi a ɛte saa ama onipa!

9.verse: Yesu frɛ Mateo - Yesu fi nea ɔsaa obubuafo no yare hɔ rekɔ no, ohuu ɔbarima towgyeni bi a ɔte atowgyei. Wɔfrɛ saa ɔbarima no Mateo. Yesu huu no no, ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Bedi m’akyi.” Ɛhɔ ara, Mateo sɔre dii Yesu akyi.

10.verse: Ɛbae sɛ Yesu ne n’asuafo no kɔɔ Mateo fi kodidii. Wɔredidi no, towgyefo ne nnebɔneyɛfo bebree baa hɔ ne no ne n’asuafo no too nsa didii.

11.verse: Farisifo no hui sɛ ɔne nnebɔneyɛfo ato nsa redidi no, anyɛ wɔn dɛ. Wobisaa n’asuafo no se, “Adɛn nti na mo kyerɛkyerɛfo no de ne ho abɔ nnebɔneyɛfo a wɔte sɛɛ?”

12.verse: Yesu tee no, obuaa wɔn se, “Nnipa a wɔnyare no, ɔyaresafo ho nhia wɔn, na nnipa a wɔyare no na ɔyaresafo ho hia wɔn.”

13.verse: Ɔsan kae bio se, “Monkɔhwehwɛ eyi ase wɔ Kyerɛw Kronkron no mu. Wɔakyerɛw se, ‘Ɛnyɛ mo afɔre ne ayɛyɛde na mepɛ, na mmom ahummɔbɔ.’ Mammɛfrɛ treneefo, na mmom, mebɛfrɛɛ nnebɔneyɛfo sɛ wɔnsakra mmra Onyankopɔn nkyɛn.”

14.verse: Mmuadadi ho asɛmmisa - Da bi, Yohane Osuboni asuafo baa Yesu nkyɛn bebisaa no se, “Adɛn nti na w’asuafo no nni mmuada sɛnea yɛne Farisifo di mmuada no?”

15.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Mugye di sɛ, sɛ ayeforokunu ne ne nnamfonom te hɔ a, ɛsɛ sɛ ne nnamfonom no werɛ how na wobua da anaa? Bere bi bɛba a wɔbɛfa me afi wɔn nkyɛn. Na saa bere no na wobedi mmuada.

16.verse: “Hena na ɔde ntama foforo bɛtare ntama dedaw mu? Saa ntaremu no besuane dedaw no mu ama tokuru kɛse abɛda hɔ.

17.verse: Hena na ɔde nsa foforo begu aboa nhoma nsa nkotoku dedaw mu? Sɛ ɔyɛ saa a, nsa no bɛpae nkotoku no ama nsa no ahwie agu na nkotoku no nso asɛe. Nsa nkotoku foforo mu nko ara na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde nsa foforo gugu na amma nkotoku no ne nsa no mu biara ansɛe.”

18.verse: Ɔbea bi ayaresa ne ababaa bi wunyan - Yesu gu so rekasa no, Yudafo panyin bi ba bɛkotow, sɔree no. Ɔde n’adesrɛde too Yesu anim se, “Me babea awu mprempren ara. Minim sɛ, sɛ woba de wo nsa bɛka no pɛ a, obenyan.”

19.verse: Yesu ne n’suafo no ne ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no siim sɛ wɔrekɔ ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no fi.

20.verse: Wɔrekɔ no, ɔbea bi a mogya atu no mfirihyia dumien faa n’akyi soo n’atade ano.

21.verse: Ɔkae wɔ ne tirim se, “Sɛ mede me nsa ka no nko ara a, me ho bɛyɛ me den.”

22.verse: Yesu danee n’ani ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ɔbabea, ma wo bo ntɔ wo yam. Wo gyidi agye wo. Wo ho atɔ wo.” Efi saa bere no mu, ne ho tɔɔ no.

23.verse: Yesu duu ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo no fi hɔ a ohui sɛ nkurɔfo no bi resu, na ebinom reto ayiase nnwom no,

24.verse: ɔkae se, “Obiara mfi adi. Ababaa no nwui ɛ. Wada!” Yesu asɛm a ɔkae yi maa nnipa no serew no.

25.verse: Nnipa no nyinaa fii adi no, Yesu kɔɔ faako a ababaa no da hɔ no. Osoo ne nsa. Prɛko pɛ, ababaa no nyanee.

26.verse: Saa anwonwade a Yesu yɛe yi trɛwee wɔ mpɔtam hɔ nyinaa

27.verse: Anifuraefo baanu bi ayaresa - Yesu fi nea onyanee ababaa no hɔ rekɔ no, anifuraefo baanu bi dii n’akyi teɛteɛɛm se, “Dawid ba, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ!”

28.verse: Yesu duu fie no, anifuraefo no baa ne nkyɛn. Yesu bisaa wɔn se, “Mugye di sɛ metumi ama moahu ade?” Wobuaa no se, “Yiw, Awurade, yegye di!”

29.verse: Yesu de ne nsa kaa wɔn ani kae se, “Mo gyidi nyɛ nea mohwehwɛ mma mo!”

30.verse: Amonom hɔ ara na wɔn ani buei. Yesu bɔɔ wɔn ano se, “Monnka saa ayaresa yi ho asɛm nnkyerɛ obiara.”

31.verse: Nanso nnipa no fi hɔ pɛ, wɔbɔɔ asɛm no dawuru.

32.verse: Mumu bɔdamfo bi ayaresa - Yesu ne n’asuafo refi adi no, wɔde mumu bi a honhommɔne wɔ ne so brɛɛ no.

33.verse: Yesu tuu honhommɔne no, na prɛkopɛ, mumu no kasae. Saa honhommɔnetu yi yɛɛ nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa nwonwa ma wɔkae se, “Yenhuu saa anwonwade yi bi da wɔ Israelman mu ha!”

34.verse: Farisifo no de, wɔkae se, “Ɔbonsam de honhommɔne ahyɛ no ma nti na otumi tu ahonhommɔne no.”

35.verse: Ayamhyehye - Yesu kyinkyinii nkurow so ne nkuraa ase kaa Onyankopɔn Ahenni no ho asɛmpa wɔ wɔn hyiadan mu. Baabiara a ɔkɔe no, ɔsaa nyarewa ahorow bebree.

36.verse: Bere a Yesu huu nnipadɔm no no, ne yam hyehyee no maa wɔn, efisɛ, ohui sɛ ɔhaw ahorow gu wɔn so a wonhu nea wɔnyɛ ne nea wɔmfa a wobenya mmoa nso. Wɔte sɛ nguan a wonni hwɛfo.

37.verse: Ɛha na Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Otwa adwuma no dɔɔso, na adwumayɛfo no de, wosua.

38.verse: Enti monsrɛ adwumawura no na ɔmma adwumayɛfo bebree mmra ne twa adwuma no mu.”

1.verse: Asuafo dumien no - Yesu frɛɛ n’asuafo dumien no baa ne nkyɛn, na ɔmaa wɔn tumi sɛ wontu ahonhommɔne na wɔnsa nyarewa ne ahoɔmmerɛw nyinaa.

2.verse: Yesu asuafo dumien no din ni: Simon a ne din baako ne Petro ne ne nua Andrea; Yakobo ne ne nua Yohane a wɔyɛ Sebedeo mma no;

3.verse: Filipo ne Bartolomeo, Toma ne towgyefo Mateo, Yakobo, Alfeo ba ɛne Tadeo,

4.verse: Simon a ofi Kana, ne Yuda Iskariot a akyiri yi, oyii Yesu mae no.

5.verse: Yesu somaa asomafo dumien no, hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ, “Monnkɔ nea Amanamanmufo wɔ anaa Samariafo kurow biara mu,

6.verse: na mmom monkɔ Onyankopɔn nguan, a wɔwɔ Israel a wɔayera no nkyɛn.

7.verse: Monkɔka nkyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Onyankopɔn Ahenni no abɛn!’

8.verse: Monsa ayarefo yare, munnyan awufo, momma akwatafo ho mfi, na muntu ahonhommɔne. Sɛnea munyaa no kwa no, saa ara na mo nso momfa mma kwa.

9.verse: “Mommfa sikakɔkɔɔ, dwetɛ, anaa kɔbere sika biara mmɔ mo ho.

10.verse: Mommfa akwantubɔtɔ biara a mode nneɛma bi sɛ ntama, ntade anaa mpaboa bɛhyɛ mu. Poma mpo, munnkita bi. Ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn a moboa wɔn no tumi hwɛ mo.

11.verse: Kurow biara a mobɛkɔ mu anaa akuraa biara a mobɛkɔ ase no, monhwehwɛ onipa a Onyamesuro wɔ ne mu akyi kwan, na montena ne nkyɛn kosi da a mubefi hɔ akɔ baabi foforo.

12.verse: Sɛ mokɔ ofi bi mu a, munkyia wɔn se, ‘Asomdwoe nka mo!’

13.verse: Sɛ saa ofi no mufo gye mo fɛw so a, munhyira wɔn, na sɛ wɔannye mo de a, munnhyira wɔn.

14.verse: Sɛ morefi ofi anaa kurow biara a wɔannye mo wɔ mu no mu akɔ a, momporoporow ofi no anaa kurow no mu mfuturu a ɛwɔ mo nan ase no ngu hɔ.

15.verse: Nokware ni, atemmu da no, Sodom ne Gomora mpo benya baabi agyina wɔ Onyankopɔn anim sen saa kurow no.

16.verse: Ɔtaa ho nkɔmhyɛ - “Monkae sɛ, meresoma mo sɛ nguan akɔ mpataku mu. Monyɛ anifere sɛ awɔ na munnwo sɛ mmorɔnoma.

17.verse: Nanso, monhwɛ yiye wɔ nnipa ho! Wɔbɛkyere mo, adi mo asɛm, abɔ mo mmaa wɔ wɔn asɔredan mu.

18.verse: Me nti, wɔde mo bɛkɔ atumfo ne ahene anim. Eyi bɛma mo anya kwan aka asɛmpa no akyerɛ wɔn ne Amanamanmufo no.

19.verse: “Sɛ wɔkyere mo a, munnnwen asɛm a mobɛka de ayi mo ho ano ho. Wɔde asɛm a mobɛka no bɛma mo bere a ɛsɛ mu.

20.verse: Asɛm a mobɛka no remfi mo, na mmom, mo soro Agya no honhom na ɔnam mo so bɛkasa.

21.verse: “Onua beyi onua ama, na wɔakum no. Saa ara na agyanom nso beyi wɔn mma ama. Mma bɛsɔre atia wɔn awofo ama wɔakum wɔn.

22.verse: Me nti, nnipa nyinaa bɛtan mo. Nanso, nea obetumi agyina pintinn akosi awiei no, wobegye no nkwa.

23.verse: “Sɛ wɔtaa mo kurow bi mu a, munguan nkɔ kurow foforo mu. Mereka nokware akyerɛ mo sɛ, morenwie Israel nkurow nyinaa mu adwumayɛ ansa na Onipa Ba no aba.

24.verse: Osuani nsen ne kyerɛkyerɛfo, na akoa nso nsen ne wura.

25.verse: Osuani sua ne kyerɛkyerɛfo, na akoa nso sua ne wura. Enti, sɛ me a meyɛ ofi no ti no wɔfrɛ me ‘Ɔbonsam’ a, dɛn din na wɔremfa mfrɛ mo!

26.verse: Munnsuro wɔn a wobehunahuna mo. Mmere bi bɛba a nokware no bɛda adi. Nea wɔyɛ no kokoam no nyinaa bɛda adi.

27.verse: “Nea mereka makyerɛ mo wɔ sum mu yi, monka wɔ hann mu. Nea mereka agu mo asom yi, mompae mu nka wɔ adan atifi.

28.verse: “Munnsuro wɔn a wobetumi akum mo nipadua, nanso wɔrentumi nkum mo kra no. Onyankopɔn a obetumi akum nipadua no ne ɔkra wɔ amanehunu kurom no nko ara na munsuro no.

29.verse: Wɔtɔn akasanoma gye ahe? Abien bo nyɛ pɛsewa pɛ? Nanso, akasanoma biara nni hɔ a obewu a mo Agya no nnim ho biribi.

30.verse: Mo tinhwi mpo, wɔakan ne nyinaa.

31.verse: Enti, munnsuro! Mosom bo ma Onyankopɔn sen nkasanoma.

32.verse: “Obiara a ɔbɛka se onim me nnipa anim no, me nso mɛka se minim no m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no anim.

33.verse: Nanso, obiara a ɔbɛka se onnim me nnipa anim no, me nso mɛka se minnim no wɔ mágya a ɔwɔ soro no anim.

34.verse: Ɛnyɛ asomdwoe, ɛyɛ ɔko - “Munnsusuw sɛ mede asomdwoe na ɛbaa asase yi so! Ɛnyɛ asomdwoe na mede bae na mmom, ɔko na mede bae.

35.verse: Maba sɛ mɛma ɔbabarima asɔre atia n’agya, na ɔbabea asɔre atia ne na, na ɔbea warefo nso asɔre atia n’asebea.

36.verse: Obiara tamfo a ne ho yɛ hu no befi n’ankasa ne fi.

37.verse: Nea ɔdɔ n’agya anaa ne na kyɛn me no, rentumi nyɛ me de. Saa ara na nea ɔdɔ ne babarima anaa ne babea kyɛn me no, rentumi nyɛ me de ara nen.

38.verse: Sɛ obi amfa n’asennua na wammedi m’akyi a, ɔrentumi nyɛ me de.

39.verse: “Sɛ woma wo kra som wo bo a, wobɛhwere wo kra no, nanso sɛ wode wo kra no ma me a, wobegye no nkwa.

40.verse: “Obiara a ogye mo no gye me, na nea ogye me no nso gye Onyankopɔn a ɔsomaa me no.

41.verse: Sɛ wugye odiyifo bi sɛ ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn nipa nti a, wobetua wo so ka sɛ odiyifo no ara pɛ. Na sɛ wugye nipa trenee a, wubenya akatua sɛ onipa trenee.

42.verse: “Na obiara a ɔbɛma m’akyidifo yi mu akumaa bi nsu anom no, onii no akatua remmɔ no da.”

1.verse: Yohane Osuboni ahoyeraw - Yesu wiee n’asuafo dumien no kasakyerɛ no, ofii hɔ kɔɔ nkurow a ɛbemmɛn no mu kɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ asɛm no.

2.verse: Yohane Osuboni a na saa bere no ɔda afiase no tee anwonwade a Yesu reyɛ no, ɔsomaa n’asuafo bebisaa no se,

3.verse: “Wone nea ɔreba no, anaa yɛnhwɛ ɔfoforo anim?”

4.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Monsan nkɔ nkɔka anwonwade a moahu ne nea moate nkyerɛ Yohane se,

5.verse: ‘Mema anifuraefo hu ade, mmubuafo nantew, akwatafo ho fi, asotifo te asɛm, na awufo nso nyan. Afei monka nkyerɛ no se, meka asɛmpa no kyerɛ ahiafo.

6.verse: Monsan nka nkyerɛ no bio se, ‘Nhyira ne wɔn a wogye me di.’ “

7.verse: Yohane asuafo no kɔe no, Yesu fitii ase kaa Yohane ho asɛm kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no. Obisaa wɔn se, “Mokɔɔ sare so no, dɛn na mokɔe sɛ morekɔhwɛ? Sare a mframa rebɔ?

8.verse: Anaa na mususuw sɛ mubehu ɔbarima bi a wahyehyɛ sɛ ɔhene ba te ahemfi?

9.verse: Anaa Onyankopɔn odiyifo? Ɛnne, mereka makyerɛ mo se, ɔsen odiyifo.

10.verse: Na Yohane ne onipa a wɔkaa ne ho asɛm se, ‘Mɛsoma me bɔfo adi w’anim, na ɔno na obesiesie w’anim kwan.’

11.verse: “Nokware ni, nnipa nyinaa mu, obiara nni hɔ a wagye din sɛ Yohane Osuboni. Nanso, nea ɔyɛ aketewa koraa wɔ ɔsoro ahenni mu no yɛ ɔkɛse sen no!

12.verse: Na efi bere a Yohane Osuboni fii ase kaa asɛmpa no, bɔɔ nkurɔfo asu de besi nnɛ no, nnipa bebree a wɔaso asɛm no mu dennen no repere akɔ ɔsoro ahenni no mu.

13.verse: Ansa na Yohane rebɛba no, na adiyifo ne Mose mmara no aka ɔsoro ahenni no ho asɛm dedaw.

14.verse: Sɛ mopɛ sɛ mote nea mereka no ase de a, Yohane no, ɔno ne Elia a adiyifo no hyɛɛ ne ho nkɔm sɛ ɔbɛba no.

15.verse: Nea ɔwɔ aso no, ontie!

16.verse: “Dɛn ho na metumi de nnɛɛmmafo yi atoto? Wɔte sɛ mmofra a wɔte baabi redi agoru. Ɛfa ka kyerɛ ɛfa se,

17.verse: ‘Yɛtoo anigye nnwom maa mo, nso moansaw. Yɛtoo awerɛhow nnwom nso maa mo, nanso moansu.’

18.verse: Yohane bae a onnidi na ɔnnom nsa no, wose, ɔwɔ honhommɔne.

19.verse: Onipa Ba no bae a odidi na ɔnom no nso, wose, ‘Monhwɛ odidifo ne ɔsanomfo a ɔne towgyefo ne nnebɔneyɛfo fa nnamfo.” Nanso nea efi Onyankopɔn nyansa mu ba no, ma nokware da adi.”

20.verse: Korasin, Betsaida ne Kapernaum, munnue! - Afei ofitii ase kaa nkurow a ɔyɛɛ anwonwade ahorow wɔ hɔ nanso wɔansakra wɔn adwene no anim se,

21.verse: “Korasin, due! Betsaida, due! Anwonwade a meyɛe wɔ mo mu no, sɛ meyɛɛ wɔ Tiro ne Sidon a, anka ɛhɔfo no de awerɛhow ne ahonu asakra wɔn adwene dedaw.

22.verse: Atemmu da no, asɛm a ɛbɛto wɔn no bɛsen nea ɛbɛto Tiro ne Sidon!

23.verse: Na wo, Kapernaum, wopɛ sɛ woma wo ho so, nanso wɔbɛbrɛ wo ase de wo akɔ amanehunu kurom. Anwonwade a meyɛe wɔ wo hɔ no, sɛ wɔyɛe wɔ Sodom a, anka ɛda so wɔ hɔ besi nnɛ.

24.verse: Mereka nokware akyerɛ mo se, atemmu da no, Tiro ne Sidon benya gyinabea pa asen mo!”

25.verse: Agya no ayeyi - Asɛnka no akyi Yesu bɔɔ mpae se, “Agya, ɔsoro ne asase wura, meda wo ase sɛ woanna nokware no adi ankyerɛ wɔn a wosusuw sɛ wɔyɛ anyansafo, na mmom wodaa no adi kyerɛɛ mmofra nkumaa.

26.verse: Nanso, Agya, wo pɛ mu na woma ɛbaa saa.

27.verse: “M’agya no de nneɛma nyinaa ahyɛ me nsa. Agya no nim Ɔba no nko ara. Ɔba no nso nim Agya no. Wɔn a Ɔba no aka Agya no ho asɛm akyerɛ wɔn no nso nim Agya no.

28.verse: Mo a moayɛ adwuma abrɛ na wɔasoa mo nnosoa nyinaa, mommra me nkyɛn, na mɛma mo ahome.

29.verse: Muntie me nkyerɛkyerɛ na munsua nea mekyerɛ mo no nso, efisɛ, midwo, na mebrɛ me ho ase. Na mubenya home ama mo kra.

30.verse: Efisɛ, nkyerɛkyerɛ a mɛkyerɛkyerɛ mo no sua yɛ mmerɛw, na dwuma a mɛma mo adi no nso nyɛ den.”

1.verse: Homeda ho asɛnka - Homeda bi, Yesu ne n’asuafo no kɔfaa aburowfuw bi mu. Wɔnam aburowfuw no mu no, ɔkɔm dee asuafo no ma wɔpempanee aburow no bi wee.

2.verse: Farisifo bi huu nea asuafo no reyɛ no, anyɛ wɔn abodwo. Wobisaa Yesu se, “Woahu sɛ w’asuafo no abu Homeda mmara no so?”

3.verse: Yesu nso bisaa wɔn se, “Monkenkanee nea ɔhene Dawid yɛe, bere a ɔkɔm dee ɔne wɔn a na wɔka ne ho no?

4.verse: Wɔkɔɔ Onyankopɔn fi kodii abodoo a wɔde abɔ afɔre a anka wonni ho kwan sɛ wodi, gye ɔsɔfo nko ara no. Ɛno nso yɛ mmara so bu.

5.verse: Na monsan nkan mfii Mose mmara no mu sɛ, asɔfo a wɔyɛ asɔrefi adwuma no tumi yɛ adwuma Homeda nso?

6.verse: Mereka ama mo ate ase sɛ, nea ɔkyɛn asɔrefi no wɔ ha!

7.verse: Sɛ moakan, ate asɛm a ese, ‘Mmɔborɔhunu na mepɛ, na ɛnyɛ afɔrebɔ’ no ase yiye a, anka moremmu wɔn a wonni fɔ no fɔ.

8.verse: Na me, Onipa Ba no, meyɛ Homeda no wura.”

9.verse: Yesu fii nea ɔwɔ hɔ kɔɔ hyiadan mu.

10.verse: Ohuu ɔbarima bi wɔ ɔdan mu hɔ a ne nsa baako awu. Farisifo no bisaa Yesu se, “Enti mmara ma ho kwan sɛ obi sa yare Homeda anaa?” Wobisaa eyi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobenya ɔkwan atoto n’ano na wɔakyere no!

11.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Mo mu hena na ɔwɔ oguan baako, na sɛ ɔkɔtɔ amoa mu Homeda a, ɔrenyi no? Ɔkwan biara so, wobɛkɔ akoyi no.

12.verse: Onipa som bo sen oguan! Eyi nti ɛwɔ ho kwan sɛ wɔyɛ papa Homeda.”

13.verse: Afei Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nea ne nsa awu no se, “Teɛ wo nsa!” Ɔyarefo no teɛɛ ne nsa. Ɔteɛɛ ne nsa no, ahoɔden baa mu ma ɛyɛɛ sɛ baako no.

14.verse: Farisifo no fii adi kotuu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛkyere Yesu, akum no, no ho agyina.

15.verse: Esiane sɛ na onim pɔw a wɔrebɔ wɔ ne ho no nti, ofii hyiadan no mu maa nnipadɔm dii n’akyi. Ɔsaa wɔn mu ayarefo no nyinaa yare.

16.verse: Nanso ɔbɔɔ wɔn ano sɛ wɔmmɔ n’anwonwade a ɔyɛe no ho dawuru.

17.verse: Eyi maa nkɔm a Odiyifo Yesaia hyɛe se,

18.verse: “Monhwɛ m’akoa a mayi no, nea medɔ no a me kra ani sɔ no; mede me honhom megu ne so. Na wabu amanaman atɛn.

19.verse: Ɔrenko, na ɔrenteɛteɛm. Na obi rente ne nne abɔnten so!

20.verse: Ɔrensɛe nea ɛyɛ mmerɛw. Ɔrempa anidaso a esua; ɔde ne nkonimdi betwa basabasayɛ nyinaa tiaa.

21.verse: Na ne din bɛyɛ amanaman nyinaa anidaso” no, baa mu.

22.verse: Farisifo ka se Yesu yɛ ɔbonsam - Afei wɔde obi a ɔyɛ mumu, yɛ onifuraefo, na honhommɔne nso wɔ ne so, brɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔnsa no yare. Yesu saa no yare ma ɔkasae, san huu ade.

23.verse: Nnipadɔm a wɔwɔ hɔ no ho dwiriw wɔn. Wɔkae se, “Gyama Yesu yi ne Agyenkwa no!”

24.verse: Nanso Farisifo no tee anwonwade a Yesu yɛe no, wɔkae se, “Ɔnam ahonhommɔne nyinaa panyin, ɔbonsam, Beelsebul no so na etu ahonhommɔne.”

25.verse: Yesu huu wɔn adwene maa wɔn mmuae se, “Ahemman biara a edi mpaapaemu no dan amamfo. Saa ara nso na kurow anaa ofi biara a edi mpaapaemu no ntumi nnyina.

26.verse: Na sɛ ɔbonsam retu ɔbonsam a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ, ɔne ne ho na ɛreko, de asɛe n’ahemman.

27.verse: Sɛ muse menam ɔbonsam tumi so na etu ahonhommɔne a, tumi bɛn so na mo nkurɔfo gyina tu ahonhommɔne? Mo ara mo nkurɔfo mmua mfa.

28.verse: Na sɛ mede Onyankopɔn honhom na etu ahonhommɔne de a, na Onyankopɔn Ahenni aba mo so.

29.verse: Obi ntumi nkɔ ɔbonsam ahemman mu nkowia no, gye sɛ, onipa ko no di kan de hama kyekyere no. Ɛno ansa na wubetumi awia no.

30.verse: Obiara a onni m’afa no, tia me. Na nea ɔmmoa me mma me-mmoaboa ano no nso hwete mu.

31.verse: “Mereka akyerɛ mo se, wɔde bɔne ne abususɛm nyinaa bɛkyɛ nnipa, nanso nea ɔbɛka abususɛm atia Honhom Kronkron no de, wɔremfa nkyɛ no.

32.verse: Nea ɔbɛkasa atia Onipa Ba no, wɔde bɛkyɛ no. Nanso, nea ɔbɛkasa atia Honhom Kronkron no de, wɔremfa nkyɛ no da biara da.

33.verse: Dua ne n’aba - “Dua biara aba na wɔde hu ne su. Dua pa sow aba pa, na dua bɔne nso sow aba bɔne.

34.verse: Awɔ mma! Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na nnebɔneyɛfo sɛ mo atumi aka nea eye ho asɛm? Nea ayɛ koma ma abu so no na ano ka.

35.verse: Onipa pa anom asɛm da nnepa a ɛwɔ ne mu no adi. Saa ara na onipa bɔne nso anom asɛm da nnebɔne a ɛwɔ ne mu no adi.

36.verse: Mereka makyerɛ mo se, atemmu da no, asɛnhunu biara a obi aka no, obebu ho akontaa.

37.verse: W’anom asɛm so, na wɔnam bebu wo bem anaa fɔ.”

38.verse: Wɔpɛ sɛ Yesu yɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi - Da bi, Yudafo mpanyimfo bi a Farisifo bi ka wɔn ho, baa Yesu nkyɛn, bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, ɔnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi nkyerɛ wɔn.

39.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Ɔman a wɔyɛ nnebɔneyɛfo a wonni gyidi, na wɔpɛ sɛ wohu nsɛnkyerɛnne. Nanso wɔrenhu nsɛnkyerɛnne biara ka odiyifo Yona de no ho.

40.verse: Na sɛnea Yona kodii bonsu yam nnansa no, saa ara na ɛsɛ sɛ onipa Ba no kodi asase mu nnansa.

41.verse: Atemmu da no, Niniwe mmarima bɛsɔre atia nnɛɛmma yi na wɔabu mo fɔ, efisɛ, bere a Yona kaa asɛmpa no, wɔsakraa wɔn adwene. Nanso nea ɔsen Yona wɔ ha, nso munnye no nni.

42.verse: Atemmu da no, Sheba hemmea bɛsɔre atia ɔman yi, efisɛ, ofi asase ano nohɔ betiee ɔhene Solomo nyansa. Merema mo ate ase sɛ, nea ɔsen ɔhene Solomo no wɔ ha nanso, mompɛ sɛ mutie no.

43.verse: “Saa ɔman debɔneyɛfo yi te sɛ obi a honhommɔne wɔ ne so. Sɛ honhommɔne no tu fi ne mu a, ekyinkyin, hwehwɛ homebea nanso, ennya bi.

44.verse: Sɛ ɛba saa a, nea honhommɔne no ka ne sɛ, ‘Mɛsan makɔ onipa a mifi ne mu bae no mu bio.’ Ɔsan kɔ onipa no mu a, ohu sɛ, ne mu da mpan, na wasiesie hɔ fɛfɛɛfɛ.

45.verse: Afei ɔsan n’akyi kɔfa ahonhommɔne afoforo ason a wɔyɛ den kyɛn no ba ma wɔn nyinaa bɛtena ne mu. Eyi ma onipa no asetena no sɛe kyɛn ne kan asetena no.”

46.verse: Yesu ne ne na ne ne nuanom - Bere a Yesu reka asɛmpa akyerɛ nnipadɔm wɔ ofi bi mu no, ne na ne ne nuanom begyinaa afikyiri pɛe sɛ wɔne no kasa.

47.verse: Nnipa a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu baako kɔka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Wo na ne wo nuanom gyina afikyiri hɔ pɛ sɛ wɔne wo kasa.”

48.verse: Yesu kae se, “Hena ne me na? Ɛhefo ne me nuanom?”

49.verse: Ɔkaa saa wiei no, ɔde ne nsa kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Eyinom ne me na ne me nuanom.”

50.verse: Ɔsan kae bio se, “Obiara a ɔbɛyɛ m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no apɛde no, ɔno ne me nuabarima, ne me nuabea, ne me na.”

1.verse: Okuafo ho bɛ - Da no ara, Yesu fii adi kɔtenaa mpoano.

2.verse: Nnipakuw kɔɔ ne nkyɛn wɔ hɔ. Ɔkɔtenaa ɔkorow bi mu a na nnipakuw no nso gyinagyina mpoano hɔ.

3.verse: Ofitii ase kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn abebu mu se, “Da bi okuafo bi kɔɔ n’afum koguu aba.

4.verse: Ogu so regu no, aba no bi guu ɔkwan mu ma nnomaa bɛsosɔw ne nyinaa.

5.verse: Ebi nso koguu abotan so. Ankyɛ na aba no fifii.

6.verse: Esiane sɛ na dɔte a ɛwɔ abotan no so no sua no nti, owia bɔɔ so no ne nyinaa hyewee.

7.verse: Aba no bi nso guu nsɔe mu. Efifii no, nsɔe no kyekyeree no ma ewui.

8.verse: Nanso aba no bi guu asase pa mu. Enyinii, sow aba mmɔho aduasa; ebi aduosia, ɛnna afoforo nso, ɔha.

9.verse: Nea ɔwɔ aso no, ma ontie!”

10.verse: Nea enti a Yesu kasa abebu mu - Owiee ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no, n’asuafo no baa ne nkyɛn bebisaa no se, “Adɛn na daa wonam abebu so kasa kyerɛ nnipa no?”

11.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Mo de, wɔde ɔsoro ahenni no ho ahintasɛm ama mo; na wɔn de, wɔmfa mmaa wɔn.

12.verse: “Nea ɔwɔ biribi no, wɔbɛma no bi aka ho na wanya ma abu no so. Na nea onni ahe bi no, kakra a ɔwɔ no mpo, wobegye afi ne nsam.

13.verse: Nea enti a ɛma mekasa kyerɛ wɔn abebu mu no ne sɛ, wohu, nanso wonhu. Wɔte, na wɔnte ase.

14.verse: “Eyi maa Yesaia nkɔm a ɔhyɛe se, ‘Ɔte de mobɛte, nanso morente ase; ohu de mubehu, nanso morenhu.

15.verse: Efisɛ, ɔman yi koma apirim. Wɔyɛ asoɔden; wɔakatakata wɔn ani. Sɛ ɛnte saa a anka wɔn ani behu ade, na wɔn koma ate asɛm ase, na wɔanu wɔn ho, asan aba me nkyɛn, na masa wɔn yare’ no baa mu.

16.verse: Na mo de, wɔahyira mo ani sɛ enhu ade; wɔahyira mo aso sɛ ɛnte asɛm.

17.verse: Na me de, mereka akyerɛ mo se, adiyifo ne atreneefo pii pɛe sɛ wohu nea muhu no, nanso wɔanhu. Wɔpɛe sɛ wɔte nea mote, nanso wɔante.

18.verse: Okuafo ho bɛ no asekyerɛ - “Afei muntie bɛ a ɛfa okuafo a ɔkoguu aba wɔ n’afum no ho no asekyerɛ.

19.verse: Wɔn a wotie Onyankopɔn asɛm no, na wɔnte ase no te sɛ aba a eguu kwan mu no. Ɔbɔnefo no ba behwim nea wɔadua wɔ wɔn koma mu no.

20.verse: Aba a eguu abotan so no gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wɔte asɛm no na wɔde anigye so mu.

21.verse: Nanso asɛm no ntim wɔ wɔn mu. Eyi nti ɛnkyɛ na asɛm no awu. Esiane sɛ asɛm no awu nti, sɛ ɔhaw anaa ɔtaa bi ba a, wɔpa abaw.

22.verse: Aba a eguu nsɔe mu no gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wotie asɛm no, nanso wiase yi mu abrabɔ mu haw ne agyapade ho dwene nti, ɛmma asɛm no ntumi nyɛ wɔn mu adwuma.

23.verse: Na aba a eguu asase pa mu no gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wotie asɛm no, na wɔte ase. Wɔsow aba mmɔho aduasa; ebi aduosia; ɛnna afoforo nso, ɔha.”

24.verse: Wura ne aburow ho bɛ - Yesu de bɛ foforo kaa asɛm se, “Ɔsoro ahenni no te sɛ okuafo bi a oduaa aburow wɔ n’afum.

25.verse: Da koro anadwo a wada no, ne tamfo nso beduaa wura fraa aburow a wadua no.

26.verse: Aburow no renyin no, na wura no nso renyin.

27.verse: “Okuafo no apaafo bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Owura, aburow a wuduae no, wura bi afifi wɔ ase!’ Okuafo no buae se,

28.verse: “‘Ɔtamfo bi na oduae!’ “Apaafo no bisaa no se, ‘Wopɛ sɛ yɛkotutu saa wura no anaa?’

29.verse: “Obuaa wɔn se, ‘Dabida!’ Anhwɛ a, na moatutu aburow no bi afra wura no.

30.verse: Momma ne nyinaa nnyin nkosi twabere, na mama atwafo ayiyi wura no afi aburow no mu ahyew, na wɔde aburow no nso agu asan so.’ “

31.verse: Onyaa aba ho bɛ - Yesu buu wɔn bɛ foforo se, “Ɔsoro ahenni no te sɛ onyaa aba ketewaa bi a obi duae wɔ n’afum.

32.verse: Ɛyɛ aba ketewaa bi, nanso sɛ enyin a, ɛyɛ dutan kɛse ma nnomaa kɔsisi n’abaa so.”

33.verse: Mmɔkaw ho bɛ - Obuu wɔn bɛ foforo se, “Ɔsoro ahenni no te sɛ abodootofo a ɔde mmɔkaw fra mmɔre na ɔka fra kosi sɛ mmɔkaw no bɛfra mmɔre no nyinaa yiye, na ama atu.”

34.verse: Yesu nam abebu so na ɔkasa kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no.

35.verse: Esiane sɛ na adiyifo ahyɛ nkɔm sɛ ɔnam abebu so bɛkasa nti, wanka asɛm a wamfa abebu amfra mu. Nkɔm a adiyifo no hyɛe ne sɛ, “Mɛkasa abebu mu, na maka anwonwade mu ahintasɛm a efi adebɔ mfitiase.”

36.verse: Wura ne aburow ho bɛ no asekyerɛ - Afei, Yesu fii nnipadɔm no nkyɛn kɔɔ fie. N’asuafo no baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, ɔnkyerɛ wɔn abebu a ɛfa wura ne aburow ho no ase.

37.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Me, Onipa Ba no, mene okuafo a oduaa aburow no.

38.verse: Afuw no ne wiase, na aburow no nso gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wɔyɛ ahenni no mma; wura no nso gyina hɔ ma wɔn a wɔyɛ ɔbonsam mma.

39.verse: Ɔtamfo a oduaa wura fraa aburow no ne ɔbɔnefo no. Otwabere no yɛ wiase awiei; atwafo no ne abɔfo.

40.verse: “Sɛnea asɛnka no mu, wotutuu wura no fii aburow no mu kɔhyewee no, saa ara na ɛbɛyɛ wiase awiei.

41.verse: Onipa Ba no bɛsoma n’abɔfo na wɔabɛboaboa wɔn a wɔpɛ bɔne, nsɛmmɔnedifo nyinaa ano afi ahenni no mu,

42.verse: na wɔatow wɔn agu ogyatannaa no mu, ahyew wɔn. Ɛhɔ na osu ne agyaadwo wɔ.

43.verse: Na atreneefo no bɛhyerɛn sɛ owia wɔ wɔn Agya ahenni no mu. Nea ɔwɔ aso no, ma ontie!”

44.verse: Agyapade ho bɛ - Yesu toaa abebu no so se, “Ɔsoro ahenni no te sɛ agyapade bi a obi kohui wɔ afuw bi mu, na ɔde ahopere kɔtɔn n’ahode nyinaa, nyaa sika a ɛbɛso saa afuw no tɔ, na ne nsa aka agyapade no!

45.verse: Ahene pa ho bɛ - “Bio, Ɔsoro ahenni no te sɛ obi a odi ahene pa ho gua a ɔrepɛ ahene pa atɔ.

46.verse: Ɔkonyaa bi a ɛyɛ fɛ mmoroso, enti ɔkɔtɔn n’ahode nyinaa de kɔtɔe!”

47.verse: Asaugu ho bɛ - Yesu toaa so bio se, “Ɔsoro ahenni no te sɛ obi a ɔkoguu asau wɔ asu bi mu yii nsumnam ahorow bebree.

48.verse: Asau no yɛɛ ma no, ɔtwe baa koko so. Afei, ɔtenaa ase yiyii nam pa no guu kɛntɛn mu, ɛnna ɔtow nea enye no gui.

49.verse: Saa ara na wiase awiei bɛyɛ. Abɔfo no bɛba abɛpaw nnebɔneyɛfo no afi atreneefo no mu.

50.verse: na wɔatow nnebɔneyɛfo no agu ogyatannaa no mu; ɛhɔ na osu ne agyaadwo wɔ.

51.verse: Mote ase?” N’asuafo no buaa no se, “Yiw.”

52.verse: Yesu toaa ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no so se, “Kyerɛwsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfo a wɔabɛyɛ m’asuafo no te sɛ ofiwura a wayi n’agyapade foforo ne dedaw nyinaa adi.”

53.verse: Wɔpo Yesu wɔ Nasaret - Yesu wiee n’abebu no, ofii nea ɔwɔ hɔ.

54.verse: Ɔkɔɔ ne kurom Nasaret. Ɔkyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn hyiadan mu maa wɔn a wotiee no no ho dwiriw wɔn. Wobisabisaa wɔn ho wɔn ho se, “Ɛhe na saa ɔbarima yi konyaa nyansa a ɔde yɛ anwonwade sɛɛ yi?

55.verse: “Ɛnyɛ kapentani no ba no ni? Ɛnyɛ ne na ne Maria? Ɛnyɛ ne nuammarimanom ne Yakobo ne Yosef ne Simon ne Yuda?

56.verse: Ɛnyɛ yɛne ne nuammeanom na ɛte ha? Na afei, ɛhe na okonyaa eyinom nyinaa yi?”

57.verse: Wɔn bo fuw no. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Odiyifo wɔ anuonyam wɔ baabiara, gye ne man mu anaa ne nkurɔfo mu!”

58.verse: Esiane sɛ wɔannye no anni no nti, wanyɛ anwonwade bebree wɔ hɔ!

1.verse: Yohane Osuboni kum - Bere no mu ara, na Herode a na odi hene wɔ Galilea no tee Yesu nka.

2.verse: Ɔtee Yesu nka no, nea ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asomfo ne sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ obiara sɛ Yohane Osuboni na wasɔre afi awufo mu. Eyi nti na wanya tumi foforo de reyɛ anwonwade ahorow yi.”

3.verse: Saa bere no, na Herode ama wɔakyere Yohane Osuboni ato afiase, efisɛ, na wakasa atia Herodia ne Herode aware no

4.verse: se, Herode aware ne nua Filipo yere.

5.verse: Herode pɛe sɛ okum Yohane. Nanso, na osuro sɛ, sɛ okum no a, basabasa bɛba ɔman no mu. Efisɛ, na nnipa no nyinaa bu Yohane sɛ odiyifo.

6.verse: Ɛbae sɛ na Herode redi n’awoda. Awoda no ase, Herodia babea besawee ma ɛyɛɛ Herode fɛ.

7.verse: Eyi maa Herode kaa ntam, hyɛɛ no bɔ se, ommisa nea ɔpɛ biara na ɔde bɛma no.

8.verse: Ababaa yi ne na Herodia tuu no fo se, ommmisa biribiara sɛ Yohane ti a wɔatwa ato prɛte mu.

9.verse: Herode tee asɛm yi no, ɛyɛɛ no yaw ma ɛhaw no. Nanso, esiane ntam a waka wɔ nnipa a wɔahyia hɔ no anim no nti, ɔhyɛ ma wɔyɛɛ nea ababaa no hwehwɛ no maa no.

10.verse: Herode soma ma wɔkotwaa Yohane ti wɔ afiase hɔ.

11.verse: Wɔde ti a wɔatwa no too prɛte mu de brɛɛ ababaa no ma ɔde kɔmaa ne na.

12.verse: Yohane asuafo no bɛfaa n’amu no kosiee no. Eyi akyi, wɔkɔbɔɔ Yohane wu no ho amanneɛ kyerɛɛ Yesu.

13.verse: Yesu ma nnipa mpemnum aduan - Yesu tee Yohane Osuboni wu no, ɔtew ne ho kɔtenaa baabi. Nnipa tee ne nka ma wɔnam fam fii wɔn nkurow ne wɔn nkuraase tiw no kɔɔ nea ɔwɔ hɔ.

14.verse: Yesu fii ɔkorow no mu baa nea nnipa no wɔ hɔ no. Ohuu nnipadɔm no, ne yam hyehyee no maa wɔn. Eyi ma ɔsaa ayarefo a wɔwɔ wɔn mu no yare.

15.verse: Anim rebiribiri no, Yesu asuafo no baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Ade resa. Aduan biara nso nni ha. Ɛha nso mmɛn kurow biara. Enti, gya nnipa no kwan na wɔnkɔhwehwɛ aduan ntɔ nni wɔ kurow no bi so.”

16.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Ɛho nhia sɛ wɔkɔ; momma wɔn aduan nni!”

17.verse: Asuafo no ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Nea yɛwɔ nyinaa yɛ abodoo anum ne mpataa abien pɛ.”

18.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Momfa mmrɛ me.”

19.verse: Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no ma wɔtenatenaa ase wɔ sare no so. Ɔhwɛɛ soro bɔɔ mpae, hyiraa aduan no so. Afei obubuu mu de maa n’asuafo no ma wɔkyekyɛ maa nnipadɔm no.

20.verse: Obiara dii nea wɔde maa no no mee pintinn. Afei asuafo no boaboaa nea wodi ma ɛkae no ano no, ɛyɛɛ nkɛntɛmma dumien.

21.verse: Mmarima a wodii aduan no dodow bɛyɛ mpemnum a mmea ne mmofra nka ho.

22.verse: Yesu nantew nsu ani - Nnipadɔm no didi wiei pɛ, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, wɔntena ɔkorow no mu nni kan ntwa nkɔ asuogya nohɔ, na ɔno de, ɔretena hɔ agya nnipa no kwan.

23.verse: Ogyaa wɔn kwan wiei no, ɔkɔɔ bepɔw bi so kɔbɔɔ mpae. Onwini dwoe no, na aka Yesu nko ara wɔ nea ɔwɔ hɔ.

24.verse: Saa bere no, na ɔkorow a na asuafo no te mu no adu akyiri. Mframa fitii ase bɔe dennen maa po no bɔɔ asorɔkye dwiradwiraa ɔkorow a na asuafo no te mu no.

25.verse: Ahemanakye bɛyɛ nnɔnan bere mu no, Yesu nam po no ani baa asuafo no nkyɛn.

26.verse: Bere a asuafo no huu obi sɛ ɔnam nsu no ani reba wɔn nkyɛn no, wosuroe, efisɛ, na wosusuw sɛ wɔahu ɔsaman. Ɛma wɔde ehu teɛteɛɛm.

27.verse: Ntɛm ara, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Ɛyɛ me. Munnsuro. Momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam!”

28.verse: Petro ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Awurade, sɛ ɛyɛ wo de a, ka kyerɛ me na me nso memfa nsu no ani mmra wo nkyɛn.”

29.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ Petro se, “Bra!” Petro fii ɔkorow no mu sii nsu no ani nantewee sɛ ɔrekɔ Yesu nkyɛn.

30.verse: Nanso, ohuu mframa a ɛrebɔ no, ne ho popoe. Afei na ɔremem. Ɔteɛteɛɛm frɛɛ Yesu se, “Awurade, gye me na meremem!”

31.verse: Ɛhɔ ara, Yesu teɛɛ ne nsa, twee no. Afei ɔka kyerɛɛ Petro se, “Wo a wo gyidi sua, adɛn na wunnye me nni?”

32.verse: Yesu ne Petro kɔtenaa ɔkorow no mu no, mframa no gyaee bɔ.

33.verse: Asuafo a wɔwɔ ɔkorow no mu no de ahodwiriw bɛkotow Yesu kae se, “Onyankopɔn Ba ne wo ampa!”

34.verse: Genesaret ayaresa - Wotwaa asu no baa Genesaret.

35.verse: Yesu duu hɔ no, ankyɛ na nkurow a atwa Genesaret ho ahyia no nyinaa tee ne nka. Wɔde wɔn ayarefo nyinaa brɛɛ no.

36.verse: Ayarefo no srɛɛ Yesu sɛ, ɔmma wɔmfa wɔn nsa nka n’atade ano kɛkɛ. Ayarefo dodow a wotumi de wɔn nsa kaa n’atade ano no ho yɛɛ wɔn den.

1.verse: Ahotew - Da bi, Farisifo ne Yudafo mpanyin no bi fii Yerusalem baa Yesu nkyɛn bebisaa no se,

2.verse: “Adɛn nti na w’asuafo no nni Yudafo amanne so? Yɛn amanne a yɛhohoro yɛn nsa ho ansa na yɛadidi no, wonni so.”

3.verse: Yesu nso bisaa wɔn se, “Adɛn nti na mo nso mode mo amanne no bu Onyankopɔn mmaransɛm so?

4.verse: Ebi ne sɛ, Onyankopɔn mmara no ka se, ‘Di w’agya ne wo na ni;’ na baako nso ne sɛ, ‘Obiara a ɔbɛka asɛmmɔne afa n’awofo ho no, ɛsɛ sɛ wokum no.’

5.verse: Na mo de, nea moka ne sɛ, sɛ obi ka kyerɛ ne na anaa n’agya se, ‘Mewɔ ade bi a anka metumi de aboa mo, nanso mede rekɔma Onyankopɔn’ a, ɛnyɛ bɔne.

6.verse: Enti mo ara monam mo mmara a moahyɛ so bu Onyankopɔn mmara a ɔhyɛe sɛ di w’agya ne wo na ni no so.

7.verse: Mo nyaatwomfo! Sɛ Yesaia hyɛɛ mo ho nkɔm se,

8.verse: ‘Saa nnipa yi ka se wodi me ni, nanso wɔn koma mmɛn me.

9.verse: Wɔsom me ani so kɛkɛ, efisɛ, wɔkyerɛkyerɛ mmara a onipa ayɛ na ɛnyɛ nea efi Onyankopɔn.’ “

10.verse: Afei, Yesu frɛɛ nnipadɔm no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Muntie nea meka no na mommɔ mmɔden nte ase.

11.verse: Ɛnyɛ ade a ɛbɛkɔ onipa mu no na ɛmma ne ho ntew, na mmom nea ebefi ne mu aba no na egu ne ho fi.”

12.verse: Nsɛm a Yesu kae yi maa n’asuafo no ba bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Wunim sɛ wo nsɛm a wokae no ama Farisifo no bo afuw?’ “

13.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Dua biara a ɛnyɛ m’agya na oduae no, wobetu akyene.

14.verse: Mummmua wɔn koraa. Na wɔyɛ anifuraefo a wɔrekyerɛ anifuraefo kwan nti, wɔn nyinaa bɛkɔ akɔtew ahwe amoa mu.”

15.verse: Petro ka kyerɛɛ Yesu se, “Kyerɛ yɛn bɛ no ase.”

16.verse: Yesu nso bisaa no se, “Ampa ara sɛ monte ase?

17.verse: Munnim sɛ ade a ɛfa onipa anom no fa onipadua no mu, na asan aba bio?

18.verse: Asɛm a ɛho ntew biara fi koma a emu ntew mu ma egu nea ɔkaa saa asɛm no ho fi.

19.verse: Koma mu na adwemmɔne, awudi, ayerefasɛm, aguamammɔ, korɔn, atoro ne ntwatoso fi.

20.verse: Eyinom na egu onipa ho fi, nanso sɛ obi anhohoro ne nsa, sɛnea mo amanne te no, na odidi a, ne ho nguu fi honhom mu.”

21.verse: Ɔbea bi gyidi - Yesu fii ɔman no mu hɔ kɔɔ Tiro ne Sidon.

22.verse: Kanani bea bi a ɔte ɔman no mu hɔ de osu baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛkae se, “Awurade, Dawid Ba, hu me mmɔbɔ! Honhommɔne hyɛ me ba mu na sɛ ɛka ne ho a, ɛma ne ho yeraw no.”

23.verse: Yesu anka hwee. N’asuafo no hyɛɛ no sɛ, ɔmpam ɔbea no mfi hɔ. Wotii mu ka kyerɛɛ no bio se, “Ka kyerɛ no na omfi ha nkɔ na ɔde n’adesrɛ no retuatua yɛn aso.”

24.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ ɔbea no se, “Wɔsomaa me sɛ memmɛboa Yudafo, Israel nguan a wɔayera no, na ɛnyɛ Amanamanmufo.”

25.verse: Ɔba bɛkotow no kɔɔ so srɛɛ no se, “Me wura, boa me!”

26.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Enye sɛ wobegye abodoo afi mmofra nsam atow ama akraman.”

27.verse: Ɔbea no nso buae se, “Ɛwom saa de, nanso akraman no nso tumi di mporoporowa a efi wɔn wura no pon so gu fam no.”

28.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ ɔbea no se, “Maame, wo gyidi mu yɛ den. Mɛyɛ w’abisade no ama wo.” Ɛhɔ ara, ne babea no ho tɔɔ no.

29.verse: Yesu sa nyarewa ahorow - Yesu san baa Galilea po no ho. Ɔforo kɔtenaa bepɔw bi so.

30.verse: Nnipa bebree de mpakye, anifuraefo, apirafo, mumu ne wɔn a wɔyare nyarewa ahorow baa ne nkyɛn sɛ ɔnsa wɔn yare ma ɔsaa wɔn nyinaa yare.

31.verse: Anwonwasɛm bɛn ni! Wɔn a wɔnkasae da kasae; wɔn a wɔn nsa ne wɔn nan atwitwa nyaa nan ne nsa foforo; abubuafo nantewee, huruhuruwii, na anifuraefo huu ade. Nnipadɔm no ho dwiriw wɔn ma wɔkamfoo Israel Nyankopɔn.

32.verse: Nnipa mpemnan aduanma - Afei, Yesu frɛɛ n’asuafo no nyinaa baa ne nkyɛn ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Nnipa yi yɛ me mmɔbɔ. Wɔabedi me nkyɛn ha nnansa. Aduan a ɛwɔ ha nyinaa nso asa. Nanso, mempɛ sɛ mema wɔkɔ wɔn afi mu a wonnidii, anyɛ saa a, wɔbɛtotɔ berɛw wɔ kwan so.”

33.verse: N’asuafo no nso bisaa no se, “Sare so ha de, ɛhe na yebenya nnipadɔm yi ano aduan?”

34.verse: Yesu nso bisaa wɔn se, “Abodoo dodow ahe na mowɔ?’ Wobuae se, “Yɛwɔ abodoo ason ne mpataa kakraa bi.”

35.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no ma wɔn nyinaa tenatenaa ase wɔ sare no so.

36.verse: Afei, ɔfaa abodoo ason no ne mpataa no hyiraa so, na obubuu mu de maa asuafo no sɛ wɔmfa mma nnipadɔm no nni.

37.verse: Wɔn nyinaa dii aduan no mee pintinn.

38.verse: Wɔn a wodii saa aduan no, na wɔn dodow yɛ nnipa mpemnan a wɔankan mmea ne mmofra anka ho. Wodidi wiei no, akyiri mporoporowa a wɔtasee no yɛɛ nkɛntɛmma ason.

39.verse: Eyi akyi, Yesu gyaa nkurɔfo no kwan maa ɔno nso kɔtenaa ɔkorow mu twa kɔɔ Magadan.

1.verse: Farisifo ne Sadukifo pɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne - Da koro bi, Farisifo ne Sadukifo baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛsɔɔ no hwɛe, wɔ ɔfrɛ a ɔfrɛ ne ho se Onyankopɔn Ba no ho. Wɔka kyerɛɛ no se, ɔnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne bi a efi soro nkyerɛ wɔn.

2.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Munim wim nsakrae ho nkyerɛase. Sɛ owia rekɔtɔ, na wim yɛ kɔkɔɔ a, moka se, ɔkyena wim bɛtew.

3.verse: Sɛ edu anɔpa na wim yɛ kɔkɔɔ a, moka se, wim rentew da mu no nyinaa. Nanso, muntumi nkyerɛ mmere mu nsɛnkyerɛnne no ase.

4.verse: Saa ɔman nnebɔneyɛfo a wonnye hwee nni yi hwehwɛ sɛ wobehu ɔsoro nsɛnkyerɛnne bi, nanso wɔrenhu nsɛkyerɛnne foforo biara ka anwonwade a woyi kyerɛɛ Yona no ho.” Yesu kaa saa wiei no, ogyaw wɔn hɔ kɔe.

5.verse: Farisifo ne Sadukifo mmɔkaw - Asuafo no twa kɔɔ asuogya nohɔ no, wɔkaee sɛ anka ɛsɛ sɛ wɔfa aduan.

6.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Monhwɛ mo ho so yiye wɔ Farisifo ne Sadukifo nyaatwom a ɛte sɛ mmɔkaw no ho.”

7.verse: Asuafo no susuwii sɛ gyama wonkita aduan biara no nti na Yesu kaa saa.

8.verse: Yesu huu nea wodwinnwen no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mo a mo gyidi sua. Adɛn na ɛhaw mo sɛ moamfa aduan?

9.verse: Enti morente ase da? Mo werɛ afi abodoo anum a mibubuu mu maa nnipa mpemnum ne ase mporoporowa nkɛntɛmma a ɛkae no?

10.verse: Mo werɛ asan afi abodoo ason a mede maa nnipa mpemnan ne nea ɛkae no?

11.verse: Adɛn nti na mudwen sɛ aduan ho asɛm na mereka akyerɛ mo? Meresan aka bio se, ‘Monhwɛ mo ho so yiye wɔ Farisifo ne Sadukifo mmɔkaw ho!”

12.verse: Afei asuafo no tee nea ɔkae no ase sɛ, Farisifo ne Sadukifo mmɔkaw ho asɛm a ɔreka akyerɛ wɔn no yɛ Farisifo ne Sadukifo nkyerɛkyerɛ bɔne bi no ho asɛm na ɔreka.

13.verse: Petro kyerɛ onipa ko a Yesu yɛ - Bere a Yesu baa Kaesarea Filipi fam no, obisaa n’asuafo no se, “Nnipa ka se, Onipa Ba no ne hena?”

14.verse: Wobuaa no se, “Ebinom se, wone Yohane Osuboni. Ebinom nso se, Elia. Afoforo nso se, wone Yeremia anaa adiyifo no mu baako.”

15.verse: Afei Yesu bisaa wɔn se, “Na mo nso, muse mene hena?”

16.verse: Simon Petro buaa no se, “Wone Kristo no, Onyankopɔn Teasefo no Ba no!”

17.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Onyankopɔn ahyira wo, Yona ba Simon. Efisɛ, ɛnyɛ onipa na oyii eyi kyerɛɛ wo na mmom, m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no.

18.verse: Wone Petro, Ɔbotan, na ɔbotan yi so na mede m’asafo besi, na tumi a ɛwɔ ɔbonsam gyam no rentumi mmubu no da.

19.verse: Mede ɔsoro ahenni no nsafe bɛma wo, na ɔpon biara a wobɛto mu asase so no, wɔbɛto mu wɔ soro! Na ɔpon biara a wubebue wɔ asase so no, wobebue wɔ soro!”

20.verse: Afei, Yesu bɔɔ n’asuafo no ano sɛ wɔnnka nnkyerɛ obiara sɛ ɔno ne Agyenkwa no.

21.verse: Yesu hyɛ ne wu ne ne wusɔre ho nkɔm - Efi saa bere no, Yesu fitii ase kaa ɔkɔ a ɔbɛkɔ Yerusalem, ne amane a ɛbɛto no wɔ hɔ wɔ Yudafo mpanyin, asɔfo mpanyin ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo no nsam, na wɔakum no, na nnansa so no, wanyan no ho asɛm pefee kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no.

22.verse: Petro frɛɛ Yesu kɔɔ nkyɛn na ɔkaa n’anim se, “Adɛn nti na woka asɛm a ɛte saa? Onyame mpa ngu! Nea woreka yi remma wo so da!”

23.verse: Yesu danee ne ho kaa Petro anim se, “Ɔbonsam, fi me so! Woyɛ me hintidua kɛse. Wudwen nnipa adwene na ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn de.”

24.verse: Ahopakyi - Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ odi m’akyi a, ɔmpa ne ho akyi, na ɔmma n’asennua so, na onni m’akyi.

25.verse: Na obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ogye ne kra nkwa no, ebefi ne nsa, na obiara a me nti ne kra befi ne nsa no, ne nsa bɛsan aka.

26.verse: Na sɛ onipa nya wiase yi mu nneɛma nyinaa na ɔhwere ne kra a, mfaso bɛn na obenya? Dɛn na onipa betumi de asi ne kra ananmu?

27.verse: Na me, Onipa Ba no, mɛba wɔ m’agya anuonyam mu a m’abɔfo ka me ho na mabebu obiara nneyɛe ho atɛn.

28.verse: Mo a mugyina ha yi mu binom wɔ hɔ a wɔbɛtena ase ahu me sɛ mereba anuonyam mu.”

1.verse: Yesu anuonyam da adi - Nnansia akyi, Yesu faa Petro, Yakobo ne ne nua Yohane de wɔn kɔɔ bepɔw tenten bi a ɛso yɛ dinn atifi.

2.verse: Wɔwɔ hɔ no, wohui sɛ ne nipadua asesa ama n’anim ahyerɛn sɛ owia, ma n’atade ayɛ fitafita sɛ nwera.

3.verse: Prɛko pɛ, Mose ne Elia befii hɔ a wɔne Yesu rekasa.

4.verse: Petro kae se, “Awurade, ɛyɛ nwonwa sɛ yɛn nso yɛwɔ ha bi. Sɛ wobɛpene so a, anka mɛbɔ asese abiɛsa, na mede baako ama wo, na mede baako ama Mose, na mede baako ama Elia.”

5.verse: Petro gu so rekasa no, omununkum hrann bi bɛkɛtaa wɔn so; ɛnna ɛnne bi fi omununkum no mu kae se, “Oyi ne me dɔ Ba a ɔsɔ m’ani. Muntie no.”

6.verse: Asuafo no tee ɛnne no, wosuroi ma wɔde wɔn anim butubutuw fam.

7.verse: Yesu baa wɔn nkyɛn besusoo wɔn mu kae se, “Monsɔre! Munnsuro!”

8.verse: Wɔmaa wɔn ani so, nso wɔanhu obiara sɛ Yesu nko ara.

9.verse: Ɛbae sɛ, wɔresian afi bepɔw no so no, Yesu bɔɔ wɔn ano se, wɔnnka nea wɔahu no nnkyerɛ obiara kosi sɛ obenyan afi awufo mu.

10.verse: Elia ba a ɛto so abien ho asɛm - Yesu asuafo no bisaa no se, “Adɛn nti na daa Yudafo mpanyin ka ti mu se, ɛsɛ sɛ Elia san ba ansa na Agyenkwa no aba?”

11.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Nea wɔreka no wom. Ɛsɛ sɛ Elia di kan ba bɛtoto nneɛma yiye.

12.verse: Na nokware ni, Elia aba dedaw na wɔanhu no, na dodow no ara ne no anni no yiye. Na me, Agyenkwa no nso, mehu amane wɔ wɔn nsam saa ara.”

13.verse: Afei na asuafo no hui sɛ, Yohane Osuboni ho asɛm na ɔreka no.

14.verse: Otwafo bi ayaresa - Bere a osian duu bepɔw no ase no, ohui sɛ nnipadɔm retwɛn no. Ɔbarima bi bebuu Yesu nkotodwe kae se,

15.verse: “Owura, hu me ba bi a otwa mmɔbɔ, efisɛ, ɔwɔ ɔhaw kɛse mu. Sɛ otwa no ba a, etumi twa no hwe ogya anaa nsu mu.

16.verse: Enti, mede no brɛɛ w’asuafo no sɛ wɔnsa no yare, nanso wɔantumi.”

17.verse: Yesu kae se, “Mo asoɔdenfo a munni gyidi! Me ne mo ntena nkosi da bɛn? Momfa no mmrɛ me wɔ ha.”

18.verse: Yesu teɛteɛɛ honhommɔne a ɛwɔ abarimaa no mu no ma etu fii ne mu, maa amonom hɔ ara, ne ho tɔɔ no.

19.verse: Gyidi mu tumi - Ɛkaa Yesu ne n’asuafo no, wobisaa no se, “Adɛn nti na yɛantumi antu honhommɔne no?”

20.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Efisɛ, mo gyidi sua.” Ɔtoaa so se, “Sɛ mowɔ gyidi sɛ onyaa aba a esua koraa no a, anka mubetumi aka akyerɛ bepɔw yi se, ‘Tutu kɔ nohɔ!’ na ebetutu akɔ akyirikyiri.

21.verse: Na saa honhommɔne a ɛte sɛɛ de, ɛrentumi ntu da, gye sɛ, monam mpaebɔ ne mmuadadi so.”

22.verse: Yesu ka ne wu ho asɛm - Da bi a Yesu ne n’asuafo no wɔ Galilea no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Wɔrebeyi Onipa Ba no de no ahyɛ wɔn a

23.verse: wɔwɔ tumi no nsa, na wɔakum no, na ne nnansa so no, wanyan aba nkwa mu bio.” Asuafo no tee saa asɛm yi no, wɔn werɛ howee na wɔn koma nso tui.

24.verse: Yesu tua asɔredan mu tow - Bere a wobeduu Kapernaum no nso, ɛhɔ asɔre no mu towgyefo baa Petro nkyɛn bebisaa no se, “Enti wo wura tua tow?”

25.verse: Petro buaa no se, “Yiw, otua” Petro fi hɔ no, ɔkɔɔ fie kɔbɔɔ Yesu amanneɛ a ɛfa towtua no ho. Yesu amma n’ano ansi koraa na obisaa no se, “Na wo Petro, wo nso wudwen ho dɛn? Ahemfo twa tow ma wɔn ara wɔn manfo tua, anaasɛ, wotwa ma ahɔho a wodi wɔn so no?”

26.verse: Petro buae se, “Wotwa tow no ma ahɔho no.” Yesu nso buae se, “Petro, mo! Ɛnne na ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔman mma no tua tow biara.

27.verse: Na mmom, esiane sɛ, mempɛ sɛ wɔfa yɛn ho abufuw no nti, kɔ asu no mu kɔto daawa. Apataa a wubeyi no adi kan no, bue n’anom. Wubehu sika a ɛbɛso me ne wo tow no tua sɛ ɛhyɛ n’anom; yi, na fa kotua ma wɔn.”

1.verse: Hena ne ɔkɛseɛ - Ɛbɛyɛ saa bere koro no ara mu, Yesu asuafo no baa ne nkyɛn bebisaa no se, wɔn mu hena na ɔbɛyɛ kɛse ɔsoro ahenni no mu.

2.verse: Yesu frɛɛ abofra ketewa bi de no begyinaa wɔn mfinimfini.

3.verse: Afei, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Merema mo ate ase sɛ gye sɛ motwe mo ho fi mo bɔne ho, na moyɛ sɛ mmofra nketewa, na mode mo ho ma Onyankopɔn ansa na mobetumi akɔ ɔsoro ahenni no mu.”

4.verse: Enti, obiara a ɔbɛbrɛ ne ho ase sɛ abofra yi no, ɔno ne kɛse koraa ɔsoro ahenni no mu.

5.verse: Na mo mu biara a, me nti, obegye abofra ketewa biara te sɛ oyi no, wagye me nso aba ne nkyɛn.

6.verse: Enti sɛ obi to mmofra nketewa a wogye me di yi bi hintidua a, eye ma no sɛ anka wɔde ɔbotan bɛsɛn ne kɔn mu atow no akyene ɛpo mu.

7.verse: “Wiase nnue wɔ ne hintiduato ho! Hintiduato wɔ hɔ de, nanso nea ɛnam ne so bɛba no nnue.

8.verse: Enti, sɛ wo nsa anaa wo nan ma woyɛ bɔne a, twa na tow kyene. Eye ma wo sɛ wode dɛm bɛkɔ soro sen sɛ wɔde wo nipa mu bɛto ogyatannaa mu.

9.verse: Na sɛ w’ani ma woyɛ bɔne a, tu na tow kyene. Eye ma wo sɛ wode ani koro bɛkɔ ɔsoro sen sɛ wowɔ ani abien na wɔde wo bɛto ogyatannaa mu.

10.verse: Oguan a wayera no ho bɛ - “Monhwɛ yiye, na moammu saa mmofra nketewa yi mu baako koraa animtia. Mereka akyerɛ mo se, ɔsoro hɔ no, wɔn abɔfo wɔ m’agya nkyɛn daa.

11.verse: Na me, Agyenkwa no, mebae sɛ merebegye wɔn a wɔayera no nkwa.

12.verse: “Sɛ onipa bi wɔ nguan ɔha, na wɔn mu baako kokyin na ɔyera a, dɛn na ɔbɛyɛ? Ɔrennyaw aduɔkron akron no hɔ nkokyinkyin mmepɔw so ne abon mu nhwehwɛ nea wayera no?

13.verse: Na sɛ ɛba sɛ ohu saa oguan no a, n’ani gye no ho sen aduɔkron akron a wɔwɔ fie no.

14.verse: Saa ara nso na m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no mpɛ sɛ nketewa yi mu baako bɛyera.

15.verse: Onua fom wo a, w’asɛde - “Sɛ wo nua fom wo a, kɔ ne nkyɛn na wo ne no baanu no nka nea ɔyɛɛ wo a ɛnyɛ wo dɛ no. Sɛ otie nea woka no, na ɔte ne ho ase a, onua ayɛ onua.

16.verse: Na sɛ wantie nso a, san fa onipa baako anaa baanu ka wo ho kɔ ne nkyɛn na wɔadi nea ebesi hɔ no nyinaa ho adanse.

17.verse: Sɛ wantie wo ara a, fa asɛm no kɔma asafo. Na sɛ wudi bem asafo no anim na ɔnte ne ho ase ara a, asafo no mpam no mfi wɔn mu.

18.verse: Mereka akyerɛ mo se, biribiara a mobɛkyekye wɔ asase so no, wɔakyekye wɔ soro; na biribiara a moasan wɔ asase so no, wɔasan wɔ soro.

19.verse: “Meresan aka akyerɛ mo bio se, sɛ mo mu baanu biara a wɔte asase yi so hwehwɛ biribi, na wɔde nokware bisa m’agya a ɔwɔ soro no a, ɔbɛyɛ ama wɔn.

20.verse: Na nea baanu anaa baasa ahyia wɔ me din mu no, na mewɔ wɔn mfinimfini.”

21.verse: Ɔpaani tirimɔdenfo no - Petro baa Yesu nkyɛn bebisaa no se, “Awurade, mpɛn ahe na sɛ me nua fom me a, memfa nkyɛ no? Mpɛn ason anaa?”

22.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Dabi! Mpɛn aduɔson ahorow ason!

23.verse: “Ɔsoro ahenni no te sɛ ɔhene bi a ɔpɛe sɛ ɔne n’apaafo bu nkontaa.

24.verse: Nkontaabu no mu no, wɔde ɔpaani bi a ɔde no ka sidi ɔpepem du brɛɛ no.

25.verse: Esiane sɛ na onni sika a ɔde betua ka no nti, ɔhene no hyɛe sɛ wɔntɔn ɔne ne yere ne ne mma ne biribiara a ɔwɔ na wɔmfa mmetua ka no.

26.verse: “Ɔpaani no de n’anim butuw fam srɛɛ ne wura yi se, ‘Me wura, hu me mmɔbɔ, na tɔ wo bo ase ma me, na mɛba abetua ka a mede wo no nyinaa.’

27.verse: “Ɔpaani yi asɛm a ɔkae yi yɛɛ ɔhene no mmɔbɔ, ma ogyaa no de ne ka no nyinaa nso kyɛɛ no.

28.verse: “Saa ɔpaani yi fi hɔ no, okohuu ɔpaani foforo bi a ɔde no ka sidi mpenu. Otim no amenewa sɛ ontua no ka a ɔde no no wɔ hɔ ara.

29.verse: “Ɔkafo no kotow, paa no kyɛw se ɔntɔ ne bo ase mma no na obetua no ka.

30.verse: “Nanso, ɔno de, wampene. Ɔma wɔde ɔkafo yi kɔtoo afiase sɛ gye sɛ watua no ka a ɔde no no nyinaa ansa na ɔbɛma wɔagyaa no.

31.verse: “Ɔkafo yi nnamfo kɔkaa asɛm a asi no nyinaa kyerɛɛ ɔhene no.

32.verse: Ɔhene no tee no, ɔfrɛɛ saa ɔpaani a ɔde ne ho kyɛɛ no no baa n’anim. Ɔka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Onipa bɔne ne otirimɔdenfo! Wosrɛɛ me no, mede ka kɛse a wode me no nyinaa kyɛɛ wo;

33.verse: ɛnsɛ wo sɛ wo nso wuhu wo yɔnko mmɔbɔ sɛnea mihuu wo mmɔbɔ no anaa?’

34.verse: “Ɔhene no de abufuw ma wɔde ɔpaani yi kɔtoo afiase kae se, gye sɛ watua ka a ɔde no no nyinaa ansa na ɔbɛma wɔayi no.

35.verse: Saa ara na sɛ moamfa mo nuanom mfomso ankyɛ wɔn a, me soro Agya nso, remfa mo mfomso nkyɛ mo.”

1.verse: Awaregyae - Yesu wiee n’asɛnka no, ɔkɔɔ Galilea. Ofi Galilea no, otwaa asubɔnten Yordan baa Yudea.

2.verse: Nnipadɔm tu dii n’akyi ma ɔsaa wɔn yare.

3.verse: Farisifo bi ba bebisaa no nsɛm bi, pɛe sɛ wɔnam wɔn nsɛmmisa no so ma ɔka asɛm bi a, ɛde no bɛkɔ sɔhwɛ mu. Wobisaa no se, “Wopene awaregyae so anaa?”

4.verse: Yesu nso bisaa wɔn se, “Gyama monkenkan Kyerɛw Kronkron no? Wɔakyerɛw wɔ mu se, ‘Mfitiase no, Onyankopɔn bɔɔ ɔbarima ne ɔbea.

5.verse: Eyi nti na ɔbarima begyaw n’agya ne ne na hɔ de ne ho akɔbata ne yere ho daa nyinaa.

6.verse: Na wɔn baanu no abɛyɛ ɔhonam koro. Enti nea Onyankopɔn aka abom no, ɛnsɛ sɛ onipa tetew mu’.”

7.verse: Farisifo no kɔɔ so bisaa no se, “Adɛn nti na Mose kae se, sɛ ɔbarima bi pɛ sɛ ogyaa ne yere a, otumi kyerɛw no krataa kɛkɛ de gyaa no?”

8.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Esiane sɛ na mo koma apirim no nti, na Mose maa awaregyae ho kwan, na ɛnyɛ ade a Onyankopɔn hyehyɛe.

9.verse: Na mereka akyerɛ mo se, obiara a obegyaa ne yere, a ɛnyɛ sɛ, ɔbea no abɔ aguaman, na ɔbɛsan aware ɔbea foforo no, asɛe aware.”

10.verse: Yesu asuafo no kae se, “Sɛ saa na ɛte de a, na ɛnsɛ sɛ obiara ware.”

11.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Ɛnyɛ obiara na obetumi agye saa asɛm yi atom, gye wɔn a Onyankopɔn hyɛ wɔn den no nko ara.

12.verse: Wɔwoo binom sɛ wommedi sigyaw; ebinom nso, esiane dɛm nti, wɔnware; ebinom nso, esiane ɔsoro ahenni no nti, wɔpo aware. Obiara a obetumi no, nni m’asɛm a maka yi so.”

13.verse: Yesu hyira mmofra nkumaa - Wɔde mmofra nkumaa brɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔmfa ne nsa ngu wɔn so, na ɔmmɔ mpae mma wɔn. Nanso asuafo no tramtram wɔn a wɔde mmofra no bae no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Monnhaw Yesu.”

14.verse: Nanso Yesu kae se, “Momma mmofra no kwan na wɔmmra me nkyɛn, na munnsiw wɔn kwan, na eyinom sɛɛ na ɔsoro ahenni no yɛ wɔn dea.”

15.verse: Na ɔde ne nsa guu wɔn so, hyiraa wɔn ansa na ɔrefi hɔ akɔ.

16.verse: Aberante sikani no - Da bi, aberante bi baa Yesu nkyɛn bebisaa no se, “Me wura pa, dɛn na menyɛ na manya nkwa a ɛnni awiei?”

17.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Sɛ wofrɛ me ɔpapa a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ wofrɛ me Onyankopɔn, efisɛ, Onyankopɔn nko ara na oye. W’asɛmmisa no ho mmuae ara ne sɛ, sɛ wopɛ sɛ wokɔ soro de a, di mmaransɛm no so.”

18.verse: Aberante no nso bisaa no se, “Mmaransɛm no mu nea ɛwɔ he?” Yesu buaa no se, “Nni awu. Nsɛe aware. Mmɔ korɔn. Nni atoro.

19.verse: Di w’agya ne wo na ni, na dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho!”

20.verse: Aberante no nso kae se, “Midi eyinom nyinaa so pɛpɛɛpɛ. Afei, menyɛ dɛn?”

21.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wuwie pɛyɛ a, kɔ na kɔtɔn biribiara a wowɔ, na fa sika a wubenya afi mu no ma ahiafo. Ɛno ansa na wubenya agyapade wɔ soro. Wuwie eyi a, afei bra na bedi m’akyi.”

22.verse: Esiane sɛ na saa aberante yi wɔ ahonyade bebree nti, ɔtee saa asɛm yi no, anyɛ no dɛ ma ɔde awerɛhow fii hɔ kɔe.

23.verse: Afei, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Ɛyɛ den ma osikani sɛ ɔbɛkɔ ɔsoro ahenni no mu.

24.verse: Meka miti mu bio se, ɛyɛ mmerɛw sɛ nantwi bewura pane aniwa mu sen sɛ osikani bɛkɔ Onyankopɔn Ahenni mu!”

25.verse: Asuafo no tee saa asɛm yi no, wɔn adwenem yɛɛ wɔn nnaa. Wobisae se, “Na ɛnne hena na wiase ha wobegye no nkwa?”

26.verse: Yesu hwɛɛ wɔn buae se, “Onipa fam de, ɛyɛ den; na Onyankopɔn fam de, ɛyɛ mmerɛw.”

27.verse: Ahopakyi - Petro nso kae se, “Yɛagyaw biribiara hɔ abedi w’akyi: na dɛn mfaso na yebenya afi w’akyidi no mu?”

28.verse: Yesu buae se, “Me, Agyenkwa no, sɛ metena m’anuonyam ahengua no so a, nokwarem, mo m’asuafo yi nso, bɛtena ahengua dumien no so, na moabu Israel mmusuakuw dumien no atɛn.

29.verse: Na obiara a obegyaw ne fi, ne nuammarimanom ne nuammeanom, n’agya, ne na, ne yere, ne mma, anaa n’agyapade abedi m’akyi no, obenya no mmɔho ɔha, na wanya nkwa a enni awiei nso.

30.verse: Na wɔn a wodi kan no mu pii bedi akyiri, na wɔn a wodi akyiri no nso mu bi abedi kan.”

1.verse: Afum adwumayɛ - Yesu san buu wɔn bɛ foforo bi se, “Ɔsoro ahenni te sɛ okuafo bi a ofii adi anɔpa bi sɛ ɔrekɔhwehwɛ nnipa abɔ wɔn paa.

2.verse: Ne nsa kaa apaafo no, ɔne wɔn hyehyɛe sɛ obetua wɔn da koro adwuma so akatua.

3.verse: Ankyɛ, ofii adi bio kohuu nnipa bi nso sɛ wogyinagyina hɔ a wɔnyɛ hwee, na wɔrehwehwɛ obi ama wabɔ wɔn paa.

4.verse: Ɔfaa wɔn nso de wɔn kɔɔ n’afuw no mu. Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn nso se, obetua wɔn da koro adwuma so akatua.

5.verse: Ɔsan kɔe owigyinae ne nnɔn abiɛsa bere mu kɔbɔɔ nnipa foforo paa, ne wɔn yɛɛ nhyehyɛe koro no ara bi.

6.verse: “Ɔsan fii adi bɛyɛ nnɔnum bere mu, kohui sɛ nnipa bi gyinagyina hɔ. Obisaa wɔn se, ‘Adɛn nti na da mu yi nyinaa, mugyinagyina ha a monyɛ hwee?’

7.verse: “Woyii ano se, ‘Obi mmɛbɔɔ yɛn paa.’ Ɛhɔ ara na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, ‘Ɛnne, monkɔka apaafo a wɔreyɛ adwuma wɔ m’afum no ho.’

8.verse: “Eduu anwummere no, ɔfrɛɛ nea otua n’apaafo no ka no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Hwɛ na tua wɔn ka fi wɔn a wɔbaa akyiri yi no so, kosi wɔn a wɔbaa kan no so.’

9.verse: Apaafo a ɔfrɛɛ wɔn akyiri yi no nyinaa, otuaa wɔn da koro apaabɔde.

10.verse: Wɔn a wɔfaa wɔn kan no nso bae. Wosusuwii sɛ wobenya sika a ɛboro wɔn a wɔfaa wɔn akyiri yi no de no so. Nanso, wɔn nso, wotuaa wɔn sɛnea wotuaa wɔn a wɔbaa akyiri yi no ara pɛ.

11.verse: “Wɔn nsa kaa wɔn apaabɔde no, anyɛ wɔn dɛ.

12.verse: Wɔka kyerɛɛ afuw wura no se, ‘Nnipa a wɔbaa akyiri yi yɛɛ adwuma dɔnhwerew baako pɛ, nso yɛn a yɛyɛɛ adwuma fi anɔpa maa awia hyee yɛn no, woatua yɛne wɔn nyinaa akatua pɛ.’

13.verse: ”Obuaa wɔn mu baako se, ‘Damfo, menyɛɛ wo bɔne biara. Me ne wo anni ano se, metua wo da koro adwuma so akatua anaa?

14.verse: Fa sika a wo nsa aka no, na kɔ. Efi me pɛ mu na meretua wɔn a wɔbaa kan ne wɔn a wɔbaa akyiri yi no nyinaa ka pɛ.

15.verse: Mmara bi siw me ho kwan sɛ mede me sika yɛ nea mepɛ? Anaasɛ, m’ayamye nti na w’ani abere yi?”

16.verse: Asɛm a Yesu ka de wiei ne sɛ, “Saa ara na wɔn a wodi akyiri no bedi kan, na wɔn a wodi kan no nso bedi akyiri.”

17.verse: Yesu hyɛ ne wu ho nkɔm bio - Yesu siim sɛ ɔrekɔ Yerusalem no, ɔde n’asuafo no kaa ne ho.

18.verse: Wɔrekɔ no, ɔtwee n’asuafo no gyinaa nkyɛn baabi ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, Yɛrekɔ Yerusalem. Wobeyi me ama asɔfo mpanyin ne kyerɛwsɛm no akyerɛkyerɛfo, na wɔabu me kumfɔ.
