19.verse: Wɔde me bɛhyɛ Roma aban nsa, na wɔadi me ho fɛw, abɔ me asennua mu, na ne nnansa so no, mɛsɔre afi awufo mu.”

20.verse: Ɛna abisade - Sebedeo mma Yakobo ne Yohane ne wɔn na baa Yesu nkyɛn. Ɔbea yi de adesrɛde bi bɛtoo Yesu anim.

21.verse: Yesu bisaa no se, “Dɛn na wopɛ sɛ menyɛ mma wo?” Obuaa no se, “Mepɛ sɛ, sɛ wokɔ w’ahenni mu a, me mma baanu yi mu baako tena wo nifa so, na ɔbaako nso tena wo benkum so.”

22.verse: Nanso Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Wunnim nea worebisa no.” Afei, ɔdanee ne ho bisaa Yakobo ne Yohane se, “Mubetumi anom kuruwa a merebɛnom ano no bi anaa?” Wobuaa no se, “Yebetumi!”

23.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Me kuruwa ano de, mubetumi anom, nanso, minni tumi sɛ miyi wɔn a wɔbɛtena me nifa anaa me benkum so. Saa afa no wɔ hɔ ma wɔn a m’agya ayi wɔn no.”

24.verse: Asuafo du a aka no tee nea Yakobo ne Yohane akobisa no, wɔn bo fuwii.

25.verse: Yesu frɛɛ wɔn nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Munim sɛ ahene ne atumfo di wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn ase no so. Saa ara nso na wɔn a wodi wɔn so no nso, di afoforo so.

26.verse: Nanso, mo de, ɛnte saa wɔ mo mu. Mmom, obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔyɛ kɛse wɔ mo mu no, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ mo somfo.

27.verse: Na sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔyɛ ne nuanom so panyin a, ɛsɛ sɛ ɔsom wɔn sɛ akoa.

28.verse: Monhwɛ me, na munsua me. Me a meyɛ Agyenkwa no, mamma sɛ wɔnsom me, na mmom, mebɛsomee, na mede me kra ato hɔ ama nnipa bebree.”

29.verse: Anifuraefo baanu hu ade - Yesu ne n’asuafo fi Yeriko rekɔ no, nnipadɔm tu dii wɔn akyi.

30.verse: Wɔrekɔ no, wɔkɔfaa baabi a anifuraefo baanu bi tetee. Anifuraefo yi tee sɛ Yesu retwam no, wɔteɛteɛɛm se, “Awurade, Dawid Ba, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ!”

31.verse: Nnipadɔm a wodi Yesu akyi no teɛteɛɛ wɔn se wommua wɔn ano. Nanso anifuraefo no kɔɔ so teɛteɛɛm se, “Awurade, Dawid Ba, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ!”

32.verse: Yesu duu nea wɔtetee hɔ no, ogyina bisaa wɔn se, “Dɛn na mopɛ sɛ meyɛ ma mo?”

33.verse: Wɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Awurade, yɛpɛ sɛ yehu ade!”

34.verse: Anifuraefo no yɛɛ Yesu mmɔbɔ. Ɔde ne nsa kekaa wɔn ani, na prɛko pɛ, wohuu ade, na wodii n’akyi.

1.verse: Yesu kɔ Yerusalem - Aka kakra na Yesu ne n’asuafo no adu Yerusalem no, wɔbɛnee kurow bi a wɔfrɛ no Betfage a ɛwɔ Ngo Bepɔw no so hɔ no. Ɛhɔ na Yesu somaa n’asuafo no mu baanu sɛ, wonni kan nkɔ.

2.verse: Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Sɛ mudu hɔ a, mubehu sɛ wɔasa afurum bi ne ne ba hama. Monsan wɔn na momfa wɔn mmrɛ me.

3.verse: Sɛ obi bisa mo se, dɛn na moreyɛ a, monka nkyerɛ onii no se, ‘Wɔn ho hia Awurade’ na asɛm biara remma.”

4.verse: Wɔyɛɛ eyi hyɛɛ tete nkɔmhyɛ a ɛka

5.verse: se, “Monka nkyerɛ Sion babea se, wo hene reba wo nkyɛn. Odwo, na ɔte afurum ne afurum ba so” no mu den.

6.verse: Asuafo baanu no yɛɛ nea Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no.

7.verse: Wɔde mmoa no brɛɛ no no, wɔde wɔn ntama sesɛw afurum no so, maa Yesu tenaa ne so.

8.verse: Nnipadɔm a wɔwɔ hɔ no bi de wɔn ntama sesɛw ɔkwan a ɔde aboa no nam so no so. Ebinom nso bubuu nnubaa, de sesɛw ɔkwan no mu saa ara.

9.verse: Dɔm no tu teɛe, de osebɔ teɛteɛɛm se, “Hosiana, Dawid Ba! Nhyira ne nea ɔnam Awurade din mu reba no. Hosiana wɔ soro nohɔ!”

10.verse: Bere a oduu Yerusalem no, kurow no nyinaa bɔɔ twi. Ɛhɔfo no bisae se, “Na hena ni?”

11.verse: Nnipadɔm no buae se, “Ɛyɛ Yesu, odiyifo a ofi Nasaret a ɛwɔ Galileaman mu no.”

12.verse: Yesu kɔ asɔrefi - Yesu fii hɔ no, ɔkɔɔ asɔrefi. Oduu hɔ no, ɔpamoo aguadifo a wɔwɔ hɔ no nyinaa kaa sikasesafo apon nyinaa guu fam, bubuu apata a wɔtɔn mmorɔnoma wɔ mu no nyinaa gui.

13.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Kyerɛwsɛm no ka se, ‘M’asɔrefi yɛ beae a wɔbɔ mpae.’ Nanso, mo de, mode hɔ ayɛ akorɔmfo atenae.”

14.verse: Afei, anifuraefo ne mmubuafo baa ne nkyɛn wɔ asɔrefi hɔ, ma ɔsaa wɔn nyinaa yare.

15.verse: Nanso, bere a asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin bi huu anwonwade yi, na wɔtee nso sɛ, mmofra nkumaa a wɔwɔ asɔrefi hɔ reteɛteɛm se, “Nhyira nka Dawid Ba no” no, anyɛ wɔn dɛ. Enti, wobisaa Yesu se, “Wote nsɛm a mmofra no reka no anaa?”

16.verse: Yesu buae se, “Yiw. Na monkenkanee saa Kyerɛwsɛm a ɛka se, ‘Mmotafowa mpo bɛkamfo no’ no da, anaa?”

17.verse: Afei ofii hɔ san kɔɔ Betania kɔdaa hɔ.

18.verse: Yesu dome aduaba bi - Ade kyee anɔpa a ɔresan akɔ Yerusalem no, ɔkɔm dee no.

19.verse: Ohui sɛ akutu bi si ɔkwan ho baabi. Ɔkɔɔ hɔ kɔhwɛɛ sɛ akutu no bi wɔ so ana, nanso oduu hɔ no, ohui sɛ ahaban nko ara na ɛwɔ so. Ɔdomee aduaba no se, “Efi nnɛ, worensow aba bio!” Ɛhɔ ara, akutu dua no wui.

20.verse: Asɛm yi yɛɛ Yesu asuafo no nwonwa ma wobisaa no se, “Na ɛyɛɛ dɛn na akutu no so ahaban poo ntɛm saa?”

21.verse: Yesu nso buaa wɔn se, “Nokwarem, sɛ mowɔ gyidi a enhinhim a, mubetumi ayɛ ade koro yi ara bi, anaa nea ɛkyɛn saa mpo. Anka mubetumi aka akyerɛ Ngo Bepɔw yi se, ‘Tutu kogu po mu’, na ebetutu akogu mu nso.

22.verse: Biribiara a mode gyidi bebisa wɔ mpaebɔ mu no, mo nsa bɛka.”

23.verse: Yesu tumi ho asɛmmisa - Yesu san kɔɔ asɔrefi hɔ a ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ no, asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin baa ne nkyɛn bebisaa no tumi ko a ogyina so pamoo aguadifo ne sikasesafo no fii asɔrefi hɔ no.

24.verse: Yesu kae se, “Merebebisa mo asɛm baako bi, na mummua me ansa.

25.verse: Onyankopɔn na ɔsomaa Yohane Osuboni, anaa ɛnyɛ ɔno?” Wɔdwennwenee ho kae se, “Sɛ yɛka se, ‘Efi Onyankopɔn’ a, wobebisa yɛn nea enti a, yɛannye nea Yohane kae no anni.

26.verse: Na sɛ yɛka se, ‘Ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔsomaa no’ nso a, dɔm no bɛhaw yɛn, efisɛ, wɔn nyinaa nim sɛ Yohane yɛ odiyifo.”

27.verse: Enti, wɔn mmuae a wɔmae ara ne sɛ “Yennim!” Ɛhɔ ara na Yesu nso kae se, “Sɛ munnim de a, me nso meremmua mo.”

28.verse: Mmabarima baanu ho bɛ - Yesu kae se, “Saa asɛm a merebɛka yi, mudwen ho dɛn? Ɔbarima bi wɔ mmabarima baanu. Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn mu panyin no se, ‘Me ba, nnɛ kɔ m’afum na kɔyɛ adwuma wɔ hɔ.’

29.verse: Ne ba no kae se, ‘Merenkɔ,’ nanso akyiri yi, ɔsesaa n’adwene na ɔkɔe.

30.verse: Afei agya no ka kyerɛɛ akumaa no se, ‘Wo nso kɔ.’ Ɔno nso kae se, ‘Agya, mate, mɛkɔ.’ Nanso wankɔ.

31.verse: Saa mmofra baanu yi mu hena na otiee n’agya asɛm?” Wobuae se, “Ne ba panyin no.” Afei Yesu kyerɛɛ asɛm no ase se, “Akyinnye biara nni ho sɛ nnebɔnyɛfo ne nguamanfo bɛkɔ ɔsoro ahenni mu ansa na moakɔ.

32.verse: Efisɛ, Osuboni Yohane ka kyerɛɛ mo se, monsakra mo su na monkɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn nanso, moansakra, maa nnebɔneyɛfo ne nguamanfo sakraa wɔn su. Na muhuu nea ɛbae no koraa, moannye anni, enti moansakra.”

33.verse: Apaafo ho bɛ - Yesu buu wɔn bɛ foforo bi se, “Da bi, ɔbarima bi a ɔwɔ mmɛfuw a wagye ban afa ho, na watu amoa a wokyi ngo wɔ mu, de afuw no gyaw akuafo bi. Eyi akyi no, otuu kwan kɔɔ ɔman foforo bi so.

34.verse: “Eduu bere a mmɛ no beree a, ɛsɛ sɛ wonu no, ɔsomaa ne ho nnipa baa akuafo no hɔ sɛ wommegye ne kyɛfo mmrɛ no.

35.verse: Woduu hɔ ara pɛ na akuafo no tow hyɛɛ nnipa no so, boroo ɔbaako, kum ɔbaako, ɛnna wosiw ɔbaako nso abo.

36.verse: “Afei, ɔsan somaa nnipa a wɔn dodow sen wɔn a ɔsomaa wɔn kan no sɛ wɔnkɔ akuafo no nkyɛn, nanso, asɛm koro no ara bi na esii.

37.verse: Eyi akyi, ɔsomaa ɔno ankasa ne ba akuafo no nkyɛn susuwii sɛ, wɔde nidi bɛma no.

38.verse: “Nanso, akuafo no hui sɛ, ne ba no afiti reba pɛ, wɔfaa ne ho adwene kae se, ‘Ɔdedifo no na ɔreba no; momma yenkum no, na yɛmfa afuw no!’

39.verse: Ɛhɔ ara, wɔtwee no fii afuw no mu kokum no too baabi.

40.verse: “Sɛ afuw wura no san ba a, mugye di sɛ dɛn na ɔbɛyɛ saa akuafo no.?”

41.verse: Yudafo mpanyin no buae se, “Ɔno nso bekum saa atirimɔdenfo no, na ɔde afuw no ama akuafo foforo a wɔde ne kyɛfa bɛma no bere a ɛsɛ mu.”

42.verse: Yesu bisaa wɔn bio se, “Monkan Kyerɛwsɛm no mu da se, ‘Ɔbo a adansifo apo no, ɛno ara na abɛyɛ ɔdan no tweatibo.’ Eyi yɛ Awurade dwumadi no bi, na ayɛ yɛn ani so anwonwasɛm yi no?”

43.verse: “Nea mereka ara ne sɛ, wobegye Onyankopɔn Ahenni no afi mo nsam de akɔma ɔman foforo a wɔbebu n’afude no ho nkontaa pa akyerɛ no.

44.verse: Wɔn a wɔbɛhwe saa nokware botan yi so no mu bebubu, na nea nokware botan no nso bɛhwe ne so no bɛpɛkyɛw.”

45.verse: Bere a asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin no tee ase sɛ Yesu asɛm a ɔreka no fa wɔn ho no,

46.verse: wɔpɛe sɛ wɔyɛ no bɔne, nanso na wosuro dɔm no, efisɛ, na wɔagye Yesu atom sɛ ɔyɛ odiyifo.

1.verse: Ayeforohyia apontow ho bɛ - Yesu de abebu ahorow kyerɛɛ sɛnea ɔsoro ɔhenni no te.

2.verse: Ose, “Ɔsoro ahenni te sɛ ɔhene bi a ne babarima hyiaa ayeforo, na ɔtow pon maa no.

3.verse: Ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ nnipa pii. Bere no dui no, ɔsomaa n’asomfo sɛ wɔnkɔfrɛfrɛ nnipa no na wɔmmra. Nanso nnipa no amma.

4.verse: Ɔsan somaa n’asomfo foforo se, ‘Monkɔka nkyerɛ wɔn se, wɔawie biribiara. Wɔakum m’anantwi ne me nyɛmmoa de anoa aduan awie. Mommra ayeforo no ase, mmedidi!’

5.verse: “Nanso, ne ho yɛɛ wɔn a ɔtoo nsa frɛɛ wɔn no serew. Obiara kodii ne dwuma. Obi kɔɔ n’afum. Ɔfoforo nso kodii ne gua.

6.verse: Afoforo nso kyeree n’asomfo no hwee wɔn, pirapiraa wɔn, kunkum ebinom nso.

7.verse: “Ɔhene no tee nea nnipa no ayɛ n’asomfo no, ne bo fuwii. Ɔsomaa n’asraafo ma wɔkokunkum awudifo no, hyew wɔn kurow no pasaa.

8.verse: Ɔsan frɛɛ n’asomfo ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, ‘Wɔawie ayeforo aduan no. Nanso wɔn a wɔfrɛɛ wɔn no mfata sɛ wɔba apontow no ase.

9.verse: Enti monkɔ mmɔnten so, na obiara a mubehu no no, momfrɛ no mmra apontow no ase.’

10.verse: “Asomfo no fii adi kɔɔ mmɔnten so kɔfrɛɛ nnipa dodow a wohuu wɔn no nyinaa. Wɔfrɛɛ nnipa pa ne nnipa bɔne maa ɔdan a wɔtow pon wɔ mu no yɛɛ ma.

11.verse: Ɔhene no baa hɔ sɛ ɔrebɛhwɛ nnipa a wɔaba no, ohuu obi a ɔnhyɛ ayeforohyia atade wɔ hɔ.

12.verse: “Obisaa no se, ‘Damfo, ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wonhyɛ ayeforohyia atade na wutumi baa ha?’ Nanso damfo no antumi ammua.

13.verse: “Afei ɔhene no ka kyerɛɛ n’asomfo no se, ‘Monkyekyere ne nan ne ne nsa na monkɔtow no nkyene akyirikyiri sum mu, nea osu ne agyaadwo wɔ no.’

14.verse: Wɔafrɛ bebree, nanso kakraa bi na wɔayi wɔn.”

15.verse: Towyi ho asɛmmisa - Farisifo no tuu Yesu ho agyina, pɛɛ ɔkwan bi a wɔnam n’anom asɛm so benya no akyere no.

16.verse: Wosii no gyinae sɛ, wɔbɛsoma wɔn nnipa bi ne Herodefo aba Yesu nkyɛn abebisa no se, “Owura, yenim sɛ woyɛ ɔnokwafo, na wonam nokware kwan so kyerɛ nnipa ɔkwan a, ɛkɔ Onyankopɔn nkyɛn a, wunsuro akyi asɛm, efisɛ, wonhwɛ nnipa anim.

17.verse: Ka ma yentie. Eye sɛ woyi tow ma Roma Hempɔn Kaesare anaa enye?”

18.verse: Yesu huu wɔn adwemmɔne no ma ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mo nyaatwomfo! Adɛn nti na mopɛ sɛ mode nnaadaa sɔ me hwɛ?

19.verse: Momfa sika a wɔde yi tow no bi nkyerɛ me.” Wɔde bi kyerɛɛ no.

20.verse: Obisaa wɔn se, “Hena mfonini na ɛda so, na hena din nso na ɛwɔ so?”

21.verse: Wobuae se, “Kaesare.” Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Ɛnne momfa Kaesare de mma Kaesare, na momfa Onyankopɔn de mma Onyankopɔn.”

22.verse: Ne mmuae a ɔmaa wɔn no maa wɔn ho dwiriw wɔn, ma wogyaw no hɔ kɔe.

23.verse: Owusɔre ho asɛmmisa - Da no ara, Sadukifo a wonnye owusɔre nni no baa Yesu nkyɛn bebisaa no se,

24.verse: “Owura, Mose kae se, ‘Sɛ ɔbarima bi anwo na owu a, ne nuabarima mfa ne yere no kunabea, na ɔne no nwo mma owufo no.’

25.verse: Anuanom baason bi ne yɛn tenaa ha. Ɔpanyin no waree a wanwo ba na owui. Enti ne nua a ɔto so abien no faa ne yere no kunabea.

26.verse: Nea ɔto so abien no nso wui, maa nea ɔto so abiɛsa no faa ɔbea no kunabea. Ɔno nso wui a wanwo ba, maa ɔfoforo nso faa ɔbea no kunabea. Eyi toaa so ara kosii sɛ, anuanom baason no nyinaa waree ɔbea no.

27.verse: Nea edi akyiri ne sɛ, ɔbea no nso wui.

28.verse: Ɛno nti, owusɔre bere no, nnipa baason yi mu hena na ɔbea no bɛyɛ ne yere? Efisɛ, wɔn nyinaa waree no!”

29.verse: Yesu buaa wɔn se, “Mo mfomso a moayɛ no fi onim a munnim Kyerɛwsɛm no ne Onyankopɔn tumi a ɔwɔ no!

30.verse: Na owusɔre bere no, aware nni hɔ; obiara bɛyɛ sɛ abɔfo a wɔwɔ soro no.

31.verse: Afei, ɛfa owusɔre no ho no nso, monkanee nea Onyankopɔn aka afa ho no pɛn? Munhu sɛ Onyankopɔn kasa kyerɛɛ mo bere a ɔkae se,

32.verse: ‘Mene Abraham Nyankopɔn, Isak Nyankopɔn, ne Yakob Nyankopɔn no?’ Eyi kyerɛ sɛ, Onyankopɔn nyɛ awufo Nyankopɔn na mmom, ateasefo Nyankopɔn.”

33.verse: Nnipadɔm no tee ne nkyerɛkyerɛ no, ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwonwa.

34.verse: Mmaransɛm no mu nea ɛkyɛn ne nyinaa - Farisifo no tee sɛ Yesu abu afa Sadukifo no so no, wɔkohyiaa Yesu.

35.verse: Wɔn mu baako a ɔyɛ mmaranimfo bisaa Yesu se,

36.verse: “Owura, Mose mmaransɛm no mu nea ɛwɔ he koraa na ɛkyɛn ne nyinaa.”

37.verse: Yesu buaa no se, “Dɔ Awurade wo Nyankopɔn, wo koma nyinaa mu, wo kra nyinaa mu, ne w’adwene nyinaa mu.’

38.verse: Eyi ne mmaransɛm no mu nea edi kan na ɛkyɛn ne nyinaa.

39.verse: Nea ɛto so abien no te sɛ ɛno ara; ‘Dɔ wo yɔnko sɛ wo ho.’

40.verse: Mose mmaransɛm ne adiyifo no nkyerɛkyerɛ no nyinaa gyina saa mmaransɛm abien yi so. Di eyinom so, na wubehu sɛ woredi nea aka no nyinaa so.”

41.verse: Hena ba ne Agyenkwa no? - Farisifo no twaa Yesu ho hyiae no, obisaa wɔn se,

42.verse: “Dɛn na mowɔ ka wɔ Agyenkwa no ho? Hena ba ne no?” Wobuaa no se, “Dawid ba.”

43.verse: Yesu bisaa wɔn se, “Ɛnne adɛn na Dawid nam Honhom Kronkron so frɛ no ‘Awurade’? Efisɛ, Dawid kae se,

44.verse: “Onyankopɔn ka kyerɛɛ me wura se, ‘Tena me nifa kosi sɛ mɛma woadi w’atamfo nyinaa so.’

45.verse: Sɛ Dawid frɛ no ‘Awurade’ a, ɛnne ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na watumi ayɛ ne ba?”

46.verse: Obiara antumi ammua. Eyi akyi nso, obiara antumi ammisa no nsɛm bio.

1.verse: Yesu ka Mmara no Akyerɛkyerɛfo ne Farisifo anim - Afei Yesu ka kyerɛɛ nnipadɔm no ne n’asuafo no se,

2.verse: “Mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo ne Farisifo no na wɔkyerɛ Mose mmara no ase.

3.verse: Eyi nti, ɛsɛ sɛ mutie wɔn, na moyɛ biribiara a wɔbɛka akyerɛ mo sɛ monyɛ no. Nanso monnyɛ nea wɔyɛ no bi, efisɛ, nea wɔka kyerɛ mo no, ɛnyɛ ɛno na wɔyɛ.

4.verse: Wɔhyɛ mo ma mudi mmara a ɛyɛ den so a, wɔn ankasa mpɛ sɛ wodi so.

5.verse: “Biribiara a wɔyɛ no yɛ ɔyɛkyerɛ. Wɔde sɛbɛ a kyerɛw nsɛm bi hyɛ mu sɛn wɔn nsa, hyɛ ntade yuu kyerɛ sɛ wɔyɛ atreneefo.

6.verse: Na sɛ wɔkɔ apontow ase nso a, wɔpɛ sɛ daa wɔtena mpanyin tenabea. Afei, wɔkɔ asɔre nso a, wɔpɛ sɛ wɔtena mpanyin tenabea pa.

7.verse: Sɛ wode obu kyia wɔn abɔnten so, na wofrɛ wɔn ‘Rabi’ anaa ‘Owura’ a, ɛyɛ wɔn dɛ.

8.verse: Mommma obiara mmfrɛ mo saa. Efisɛ, Onyankopɔn nko ara na ɔyɛ ‘Owura.’ Mo nyinaa moyɛ pɛ sɛ anuanom.

9.verse: Mommfrɛ obiara wɔ asase so ha se ‘Agya,’ efisɛ, Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ soro no nko ara na ɛsɛ sɛ wɔfrɛ no saa.

10.verse: Na mommma wɔmmfrɛ mo ‘Owura,’ efisɛ, ɔbaako pɛ na ɔyɛ mo wura, a ɔne Agyenkwa no.

11.verse: “Wobrɛ wo ho ase som afoforo a, wobɛyɛ ɔkɛse. Wopɛ sɛ woyɛ kɛse a, yɛ ɔsomfo.

12.verse: Na obiara a ɔbɛma ne ho so no, wɔbɛbrɛ no ase; saa ara nso na obiara a ɔbɛbrɛ ne ho ase no, wɔbɛma no so.

13.verse: Yesu kasa tia nyaatwomyɛ - “Munnue! Mo Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo nyaatwomfo, efisɛ, musiw afoforo ɔsoro ahenni ho kwan. Mo a, monkɔ mu. Mo nso a, momma afoforo a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔkɔ mu no kwan.

14.verse: “Nyaatwomfo! Mobɔ mpae atenten wɔ mmɔnten so de kyerɛ sɛ, moyɛ atreneefo, wɔ bere a, mutu akunafo fi wɔn afi mu.

15.verse: “Munnue! Mo Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo nyaatwomfo! Mokɔ wiase afanan nyinaa sɛ mubenya onipa baako abɛfra mo mu. Na sɛ munya obi saa a, mosɛe no ma ɔyɛ ɔbonsam ba sen sɛnea mote no.

16.verse: “Munnue! Akwankyerɛfo anifuraefo a moka se, sɛ obi de asɔredan ka ntam a, ɛno de, ɛnyɛ hwee. Na sɛ ɔde sikakɔkɔɔ a ɛwɔ asɔredan no mu ka ntam de a, ɛnne ntam no kyekyere onii no.

17.verse: Anifuraefo nkwaseafo! Asɔredan no ne emu sikakɔkɔɔ no mu nea ɛwɔ he na ɛsom bo, sikakɔkɔɔ no anaa asɔredan no a ɛtew sikakɔkɔɔ no ho no?

18.verse: Na moka se, ‘Sɛ obi ka afɔremuka no ntam a, ɛnyɛ hwee. Na mmom, sɛ ɔka ayɛyɛde a egu afɔremuka no so ntam de a, ɛkyekyere onii!’

19.verse: Anifuraefo! Afɔremuka a ɛtew ayɛyɛde a egu so no ho no, ne ayɛde a egu so no mu nea ɛwɔ he na ɛsom bo?

20.verse: Sɛ woka afɔremuka no ntam a, woka afɔremuka no ne ɛso ayɛyɛde nyinaa ntam,

21.verse: na sɛ woka asɔredan no ntam a, woka asɔredan no ne Onyankopɔn a ɔte mu no nyinaa ntam.

22.verse: Na sɛ woka ɔsoro ntam a, na woreka Onyankopɔn Ahengua ne Onyankopɔn no ankasa ntam.

23.verse: “Munnue! Mo Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo nyaatwomfo! Muyi ntotoso du du wɔ afifide a ɛwɔ mo mfikyifuw mu no ho, nanso mugyaw nneɛma a ɛsom bo te sɛ atɛntrenee, ahummɔbɔ, ne nokwaredi. Ɛwom sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ muyiyi ntotoso du du no de, nanso ɛnsɛ sɛ mugyaw nneɛma a ɛsom bo no.

24.verse: Anifuraefo akwankyerɛfo! Mosɔn nea morenom so yi mu nwansena, nanso momene nantwi!

25.verse: “Munnue! Mo Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo nyaatwomfo! Mutwiw mo nkuruwa ne mo ayowa ho fɛfɛɛfɛ, nanso emu de, asisi ne pɛsɛmenkominya ahyɛ no ma tɔ.

26.verse: Farisifo anifuraefo! Muntwiw kuruwa no mu kan, na kuruwa no ho nyinaa bɛtew!

27.verse: “Munnue! Mo Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo! Mote sɛ da a wɔasra ho fɛfɛɛfɛ, nanso awufo nnompe ne nneɛma funu ahyɛ mu ma tɔ.

28.verse: Moyɛ mo anim sɛ atreneefo, nanso bɔne ahorow ahyɛ mo mu ma tɔ.

29.verse: “Munnue! Mo Farisifo ne mmara no akyerɛkyerɛfo nyaatwomfo! Musisi ada akɛse ma adiyifo a mo ara mo agyanom kunkum wɔn, na mode nhwiren gugu atreneefo a wokunkum wɔn no da so,

30.verse: na mutwa mo ho ka se, ‘Sɛ na yɛte ase saa bere no a, anka yɛrenyɛ bɔne a yɛn agyanom yɛe no.’

31.verse: “Sɛ moka saa a, mubu mo ho fɔ sɛ moyɛ atirimmɔdenfo mma.

32.verse: Na mudi wɔn anammɔn akyi yɛ saa bɔne koro no ara bi pɛpɛɛpɛ.

33.verse: Awɔ! Nhurutoa mma! Mobɛyɛ dɛn aguan amanehunu gya mu atemmu no?

34.verse: “Mɛsoma adiyifo ne anyansafo ne akyerɛkyerɛfo aba mo nkyɛn. Mobɛbɔ wɔn mu bi asennua mu, akum wɔn. Mobɛbɔ ebinom akyi mmaa wɔ mo asɔredan mu, na moataa ebi afi nkurow so akɔ nkurow so.

35.verse: Na atreneefo mogya a moahwie agu asase so nyinaa, efi Habel so de kosi Barakia ba Sakaria a mukum no asɔredan ne afɔremuka ntam no, bɛba mo so.

36.verse: Mereka makyerɛ mo se, atemmu a wɔaboaboa ano no nyinaa, bɛba nnɛɛmma yi so.

37.verse: “O Yerusalem, Yerusalem, wo a wukum adiyifo, na wusiw wɔn a wɔasoma wɔn wo nkyɛn abo, mpɛn ahe na anka mepɛe sɛ meboaboa wo mma ano, sɛnea akokɔbeatan boaboa ne mma ano ne ntaban ase, nanso moampɛ!

38.verse: Wobegyaw mo fi fituw ama mo.

39.verse: Na mise mo sɛ, efi nnɛ de rekɔ, morenhu me bio kosi sɛ, mobɛka se, ‘Nhyira ne nea ɔnam Awurade din mu reba’ no.”

1.verse: Asɔredansɛe ho nkɔmhyɛ - Yesu refi faako a asɔredan no si hɔ no, n’asuafo no baa ne nkyɛn pɛe sɛ wɔkyerɛkyerɛ no adan ahorow a ɛwɔ asɔredan no mu.

2.verse: Nanso, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Wobedwiriw saa ɔdan yi agu pasaa!”

3.verse: Ɔhaw ne ɔtaa - Yesu kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔw no so. Ɔte hɔ no, n’asuafo no baa ne nkyɛn bebisaa no se, “Bere bɛn na nea woreka yi bɛba? Na nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛn na ɛbɛma yɛahu wo ba a, wobɛsan aba bio no ne wiase awiei a ɛbɛba no?”

4.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Monhwɛ na obi annaadaa mo.

5.verse: Nnipa bebree de me din bɛba abɛka se, wɔne Agyenkwa no, na wɔadaadaa mo mu pii.

6.verse: Sɛ mote sɛ wɔafi akodi ase a, ɛnkyerɛ me ba a mɛsan aba no ho nsɛnkyerɛnne. Ɛsɛ sɛ eyinom ba, nanso awiei no de, ennya mmae.

7.verse: Aman bɛsɔre aman so, na ahenni asɔre ahenni so, na ɔkɔm ne asasewosow bɛba mmeaemmeae.

8.verse: Eyinom nyinaa bɛyɛ nneɛma a ɛyɛ hu a ɛbɛba no mfitiase.

9.verse: “Sɛ moyɛ me de nti, wɔbɛyɛ mo ayayade, na wɔakum mo wɔ wiase afanan nyinaa,

10.verse: na mo mu pii bɛsan akɔ bɔne mu, na moayiyi mo ho mo ho ama, na moatan mo ho.

11.verse: Atoro adiyifo bebree bɛsɔre, na wɔadaadaa mo mu pii.

12.verse: Bɔne bɛdɔɔso wɔ wiase, na abrɛ nnipa dɔ a wɔwɔ no ase.

13.verse: Nanso, wɔn a wobegyina pintinn akodu awiei no, wobenya nkwa.

14.verse: “Na wɔbɛka asɛmpa a ɛfa Ahenni no ho no wɔ wiase mmaa nyinaa na wɔate. Ɛno akyi ansa na awiei no bɛba.

15.verse: Ahohia a ɛyɛ hu - “Enti sɛ muhu ‘Ade a Ɛyɛ Hu’ a, odiyifo Daniel kaa ho asɛm sɛ egyina Kronkronbea hɔ no a, ‘Nea ɔkan no nte eyi ase!’

16.verse: Wɔn a wɔte Yudea no, nguan nkɔ Yuda mmepɔw so.

17.verse: Wɔn a wɔtete wɔn afi mu no nso, nguan a wɔmfa biribiara mfi wɔn adan mu.

18.verse: Wɔn a wɔwɔ mfum no nso, nnsan wɔn akyi mmmɛfa wɔn ntama.

19.verse: “Na wɔn a wɔafa afuru ne wɔn a woturu mma saa bere no mu no nnue.

20.verse: Na mommɔ mpae, na bere a ɛsɛ sɛ muguan no anyɛ awɔwbere anaa Homeda.

21.verse: Efisɛ, ɔtaa a ɛbɛba no, ebi nsii wɔ wiase abakɔsɛm mu da, na ebi nso rensi da.

22.verse: “Nokwarem, sɛ wɔantwa saa nna no so a, nnipa nyinaa ase bɛtɔre.

23.verse: “Sɛ obi ka kyerɛ mo se, ‘Agyenkwa no wɔ ha anaa sɛ ɔwɔ nohɔ anaa wayi ne ho adi wɔ ha anaa ɛhɔ’ a, munnnye nnni.

24.verse: Atoro Kristofo ne atoro adiyifo bɛsɔre, na wɔayɛ anwonwade ahorow, na sɛ ebetumi a, wɔadaadaa wɔn mpo a Onyankopɔn ayi wɔn no.

25.verse: Mabɔ mo kɔkɔ dedaw.

26.verse: Onipa Ba no - “Enti, sɛ obi ka kyerɛ mo se, Agyenkwa no asan aba, na ɔwɔ sare so a, monnhaw mo ho sɛ mobɛkɔ hɔ akɔhwehwɛ no. Anaasɛ nso ɔde ne ho asie baabi a, munnnye nnni!

27.verse: Na sɛnea anyinam twa fi apuei kɔ atɔe no, saa ara na sɛ Onipa Ba no reba a, ɛbɛyɛ ara ne no.

28.verse: Na nea efunu wɔ no, ɛhɔ na apete mpa.

29.verse: “Ɔtaa no akyi pɛ, awia beduru sum, na ɔsram renhyerɛn, na nsoromma bɛtetew ahwe, na wɔbɛwosow tumi a ɛwɔ soro no.

30.verse: “Afei, Onipa Ba no ba ho nsɛnkyerɛnne bɛda adi, na ɔsoro ne asase sofo nyinaa betwa agyaadwo. Na wiase amanaman behu me sɛ, mede tumi ne anuonyam nam ɔsoro omununkum mu reba.

31.verse: Na mɛsoma m’abɔfo a wɔrebɔ mmɛnson aba, na wɔbɛboaboa wɔn a mayi wɔn no ano fi soro ano kɔka asase ano.

32.verse: “Afei munsua biribi mfi borɔdɔma dua no ho asɛm no mu. Sɛ eyi nnubaa foforo, san yi ahaban foforo a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛ asusow atue.

33.verse: Saa ara nso na sɛ muhu sɛ saa nneɛma yi nyinaa afiti ase resisi a, mubehu sɛ me ba a mɛsan aba no abɛn, adu apon ano.

35.verse: “Ɔsoro ne asase betwam akɔ, na me nsɛm de, ɛbɛtena hɔ daa.

36.verse: Nanso, da anaa dɔn ko a awiei no bɛba de, obiara nnim. Ɔsoro abɔfo ne Onyankopɔn Ba no mpo nnim. Agya no nko na onim.

37.verse: “Onipa Ba no ba a ɔbɛba no, bɛyɛ sɛnea Noa bere so ɛyɛe no ara pɛ.

38.verse: Na sɛnea nna a edi nsuyiri no anim no nnipa didii, na wɔnomee, warewaree, de kosii da a Noa kɔɔ hyɛn no mu,

39.verse: na nnipa annye nea ɛbɛba anni, kosi sɛ nsuyiri bɛfaa wɔn nyinaa kɔe no, saa ara na me ba a mɛsan aba no bɛyɛ.

40.verse: “Saa bere no, wɔbɛfa mmarima baanu a wɔreyɛ adwuma wɔ afum no mu baako akɔ, na wɔagyaw ɔbaako.

41.verse: Saa ara nso na mmea baanu a wɔwɔ fie renoa aduan no nso, wɔbɛfa ɔbaako agyaw ɔbaako ne no.

42.verse: Enti, monwɛn, efisɛ, munnim da ko a, Awurade bɛba.

43.verse: “Sɛnea onipa tumi wɛn de bɔ ne ho ban fi akorɔmfo ho no,

44.verse: saa ara na mubetumi asiesie mo ho awɛn de atwɛn me ba a mɛba a obiara nnim bere ko no.

45.verse: Akoa pa anaa akoa bɔne - “Woyɛ Awurade akoa onyansafo nokwafo anaa? Mama wo adwuma sɛ hwɛ me fi so, na da biara ma m’asomfo aduan nni anaa?

46.verse: Nhyira nka wo sɛ, mɛsan aba abɛto wo sɛ, wode nokware reyɛ w’adwuma.

47.verse: Mede biribiara a mewɔ no bɛhyɛ saa nokwafo no nsa, na wahwɛ so!

48.verse: “Na sɛ woyɛ akoa bɔne, na woka kyerɛ wo ho se, ‘Me wura nnya mmae,’

49.verse: na wufiti ase haw wo mfɛfo nkoa no, na wudidi, bow nsa a,

50.verse: wo wura no bɛba da a w’ani nna no kwan,

51.verse: na wabetwa wo mmaa a ano yɛ den, na ɔde wo akɔ nea wobu nyaatwomfo atɛn; ɛhɔ na osu ne agyaadwo wɔ.

1.verse: Mmabaa du no ho bɛ - “Ɔsoro ahenni te sɛ mmabaa du bi a wɔfaa wɔn akanea sɛ wɔrekohyia ayeforokunu.

2.verse: Na mmabaa no mu baanum yɛ anyansafo ɛnna baanum nso yɛ nkwaseafo.

3.verse: Wɔn mu nkwaseafo no rekɔ no, wɔamfa krasin a sɛ nea ɛwɔ akanea no mu sa a, wɔde begu mu.

4.verse: Nanso, wɔn mu anyansafo no de, wɔrekɔ no, wɔfaa krasin kaa wɔn akanea ho de kɔe.

5.verse: “Ayeforokunu no amma ntɛm, enti wofitii ase totɔɔ nko, dedae.

6.verse: Ɔdasum na wɔtee nteɛteɛm se, ‘Ayeforokunu no reba! Mumfi adi nkohyia no!’

7.verse: “Mmabaa yi nyinaa sɔre buebuee wɔn akanea no.

8.verse: Nkwaseafo no srɛɛ anyansafo no sɛ, ‘Momma yɛn mo krasin no bi ngu yɛn akanea mu na ɛredum.’

9.verse: “Anyansafo no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, ‘krasin a yɛwɔ no sua. Monkɔ kurom nkɔtɔ bi.’

10.verse: “Wɔrekɔtɔ krasin no pɛ, na ayeforokunu no bae. Enti, wɔn a wɔasiesie wɔn ho no ne ayeforokunu no kɔɔ n’apontow no ase, na wɔtoo ɔpon no mu.

11.verse: “Akyiri yi a baanum no san bae no, wogyinaa ɔpon no akyi frɛe se, ‘Owura, hiɛ yɛn!’

12.verse: “Nanso, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, ‘Mumfi hɔ nkɔ. Minnim mo!’

13.verse: “Enti, monwɛn, na munnim da anaa dɔn ko a, mɛsan aba.

14.verse: Apaafo baasa bi ho bɛ - “Bio, ɔsoro ahenni te sɛ ɔbarima bi a ɔretu kwan akɔ ɔman foforo bi so. Ɔrekɔ no, ɔfrɛɛ n’apaafo baasa maa wɔn mu biara sika a ɛfata sɛ wɔmfa nyɛ adwuma.

15.verse: “Ɔmaa ɔbaako sidi mpem anum. Ɔmaa nea odi hɔ no sidi mpem abien, ɛnna ɔmaa nea otwa to no sidi apem.

16.verse: Ɔpaani a ɔmaa no sidi mpem anum no de sika no kodii gua, nyaa mfaso sidi mpem anum kaa ho.

17.verse: Nea onyaa sidi mpem abien no nso, de sika no kɔyɛɛ adwuma, nyaa mfaso sidi mpem abien kaa ne sika no ho.

18.verse: “Nanso, ɔpaani a ne wura maa no sidi apem no de, ɔkotuu fam de sika no siee hɔ.

19.verse: “Mmere bi akyi, wɔn wura no fi akwantum bae. Ɔfrɛɛ apaafo baasa yi sɛ wommebu nkontaa nkyerɛ no.

20.verse: Nea ɔmaa no sidi mpem anum no brɛɛ no sidi mpem du.

21.verse: “Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Mo, akoa pa ne nokwafo, woadi kakraa yi ho nokware, mede wo besi nneɛma pii so panyin. Bra, na me ne wo nni dɛ!’

22.verse: “Ɔpaani a ɔmaa no sidi mpem abien no nso bae. Ɔka kyerɛɛ ne wura no se, ‘Worekɔ no, womaa me sidi mpem abien. Mede yɛɛ adwuma, na manya sidi mpem abien aka ho.’

23.verse: “Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Mo, akoa pa ne nokwafo, woadi kakraa yi ho nokware, mede wo besi nneɛma pii so panyin. Bra, na me ne wo nni dɛ!’

24.verse: “Ɔpaani a onyaa sidi apem no nso bae. Ɔka kyerɛɛ ne wura no se, ‘Owura, minim sɛ woyɛ onipa a woyɛ den. Wutumi twa wɔ nea wunnuae, ɛnna wutumi boaboa ano wɔ nea wompetee;

25.verse: enti misuroe na mede wo sika no kɔkyɛɛ fam, enti w’ade ni!’

26.verse: “Ne wura no ka kyerɛɛ no se, ‘Akoa bɔne ne onihafo! Wunim sɛ mitumi twa wɔ nea minnuae, na mitumi boaboa ano wɔ nea mempetee a,

27.verse: anka ɛsɛ sɛ wode sika no yɛ adwuma nya ho mfaso to hɔ ma me.

28.verse: Munnye ne nsam sika no, na momfa nkɔma nea onyaa sidi ɔpedu no.

29.verse: Obiara a ɔde nea wɔde ama no no bɛyɛ ade pa no, wɔde bi bɛka ne ho. Na obiara a wamfa nea wɔde ama no no anyɛ ade pa no, nea ɔwɔ no mpo, wɔbegye afi ne nsam.

30.verse: Montow akoa a ne ho nni mfaso yi nkyene sum kabii mu; ɛhɔ na osu ne agyaadwo wɔ.

31.verse: Atemmu da no - “Na sɛ, Onipa Ba no ba n’anuonyam mu a abɔfo nyinaa ka ne ho a, saa bere no na ɔbɛtena n’anuonyam ahengua no so.

32.verse: Na wɔbɛboaboa aman nyinaa ano n’anim. Na ɔbɛpaw nnipa no mu sɛnea oguanhwɛfo paw nguan fi mmirekyi mu;

33.verse: na ɔde nguan no begyina ne nifa so, na ɔde mmirekyi no agyina ne benkum so.

34.verse: “Ɛno na, Ɔhene no, bɛka akyerɛ wɔn a wogyina ne nifa so no se, ‘Mo a m’agya ahyira mo, mommra mmɛfa ahenni a wɔasiesie ama mo fi wiase mfitiase no nni!

35.verse: Ɔkɔm dee me, na momaa me aduan dii. Osukɔm dee me, na momaa me nsu nomee. Meyɛɛ ɔhɔho, na mode me kɔɔ mo fi.

36.verse: Medaa adagyaw, na mufuraa me ntama. Meyaree, na mobɛsraa me. Medaa afiase, na mobɛhwɛɛ me.’

37.verse: “Saa bere no mu na atreneefo no bebisa se, ‘Owura, da bɛn na yehuu wo sɛ ɔkɔm de wo a, yɛmaa wo aduan, na osukɔm de wo a, yɛmaa wo nsu nomee?

38.verse: Afei, da bɛn na yehuu sɛ woyɛɛ ɔhɔho a, yɛde wo kɔɔ yɛn fi, anaasɛ wodaa adagyaw a, yefuraa wo ntama?

39.verse: Afei, da bɛn na yehuu sɛ woyare a, yɛbɛsraa wo, anaasɛ wodaa afiase a, yɛbɛhwɛɛ wo?’

40.verse: “Na me, Ɔhene no, bebua wɔn se, ‘Sɛ moayɛ ama me nuanom nkumaa yi mu baako yi, moayɛ ama me!’

41.verse: “Afei, mɛdan m’ani akyerɛ wɔn a wogyina me benkum so no aka akyerɛ wɔn se, ‘Mo a wɔadome mo, wɔmfa mo nkogu ogyatanaa a, ennum da a, wɔasɔ ama ɔbonsam ne n’ahokafo no mu.

42.verse: Na ɔkɔm dee me, moamma me aduan anni. Osukɔm dee me,moamma me nsu annom.

43.verse: Meyɛɛ ɔhɔho, moamfa me ankɔ mo fi. Medaa adagyaw, moamfura me ntama. Meyaree, moammɛsra me. Medaa afiase, moammɛhwɛ me.’

44.verse: “Wɔn nso bebua no se, ‘Awurade, da bɛn na yehuu wo sɛ ɔkɔm dee wo, anaasɛ osukɔm dee wo, anaasɛ woyɛɛ ɔhɔho, anaasɛ wodaa adagyaw, anaasɛ woyaree, anaasɛ wodaa afiase, na yɛanyɛ nea ɛsɛ sɛ yɛyɛ amma wo?

45.verse: “Na mebua wɔn se, ‘Sɛ moanyɛ amma nkumaa yi mu baako nti, moanyɛ amma me.’

46.verse: “Na wɔbɛkɔ ahoyeraw a ɛto ntwa da mu, na atreneefo akɔ nkwa a enni awiei mu.”

1.verse: Wɔbɔ Yesu ho pɔw - Yesu wiee nsɛm yi ka no, ɔka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se,

2.verse: “Munim sɛ aka nnanu na Twam Afahyɛ no adu, na wobeyi Onipa Ba no ama, na wɔabɔ no asennua mu.”

3.verse: Saa bere no ara na asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin bi ahyia mu wɔ ɔsɔfo panyin Kaiafa fi,

4.verse: retu agyina, ahwehwɛ ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so akyere Yesu, akum no a obiara renhu akyi.

5.verse: Nanso, wɔkae se, “Ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔkyere no Twam Afahyɛ no mu, anyɛ saa a, ɛde basabasayɛ bɛba ɔman no mu.”

6.verse: Wɔsra Yesu ngo wɔ Betania - Afei Yesu kɔɔ Betania, na ɔkɔɔ Simon, ɔkwatani fi.

7.verse: Ɔwɔ hɔ redidi no, ɔbea bi a okita ngo huamhuamhuam bi a ne bo yɛ den yiye toa ma baa hɔ, behwie guu Yesu tirim.

8.verse: Bere a asuafo no huu eyi no anyɛ wɔn dɛ. Wɔkae se, “Adesɛe yi ase ne dɛn?

9.verse: Anka wobetumi atɔn srade huamhuamhuam yi anya sika bebree de ama ahiafo.”

10.verse: Yesu huu wɔn adwene, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Adɛn na moka nea ɔbea yi yɛɛ yi ho asɛm saa? Wayɛ ade pa ama me.

11.verse: Mo ne ahiafo wɔ ha daa, na me de, me ne mo nni hɔ daa.

12.verse: Wahwie ngo huahuamhuam yi agu me so, de asiesie me nipadua ama me sie.

13.verse: Wɔde nea wayɛ yi bɛkae no daa. Wɔbɛka nea ɔyɛe yi wɔ wiase baabiara a wɔbɛka Asɛmpa no.”

14.verse: Yuda pene so sɛ obeyi Yesu ama - Afei, Yuda Iskariot a ɔyɛ asuafo dumien no mu baako kɔɔ asɔfo mpanyin no nkyɛn,

15.verse: kobisaa wɔn se, “Sɛ miyi Yesu ma mo a, ahe na mode bɛma me?” Wɔmaa no nnwetɛbona aduasa.

16.verse: Efi saa bere no, Yuda hwehwɛɛ ɔkwan a ɔbɛfa so ayi no ama wɔn.

17.verse: Yesu ne n’asuafo adidi a edi akyiri - Twam Afahyɛ da a edi kan no, asuafo no baa Yesu nkyɛn bebisaa no se, “Ɛhe na wopɛ sɛ yɛkodi Twam Afahyɛ no.?”

18.verse: Ɔbuaa wɔn se, “Monkɔ kurow no mu nkohu ɔpanyin asomasi nka nkyerɛ no se, ‘Yɛn Wura se, ne bere abɛn, na wo fi na ɔne n’asuafo no bedi Twam Afahyɛ no.’

19.verse: Asuafo no dii nea ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no so, yɛɛ Twam Afahyɛ aduan a wobedi wɔ ofi a wonyae no mu.

20.verse: Eduu anwummere a ɔne Dumien no te adidii no,

21.verse: ɔkae se, “Mo mu baako beyi me ama.”

22.verse: Asɛm yi maa wɔn werɛ howee yiye, na wofii ase bisabisae mmaako mmaako se, “Awurade, ɛyɛ me anaa?”

23.verse: Yesu buae se, “Nea medi kan de aduan ama no no, ɔno ne saa onipa no.

24.verse: Ɛsɛ sɛ Onipa Ba no wu sɛnea odiyifo no hyɛɛ ne ho nkɔm no; nanso onipa a obeyi Onipa Ba no ama no, nnue! Sɛ wɔanwo saa onipa no a, anka eye.”

25.verse: Yuda nso bisaa no se, “Kyerɛkyerɛfo, ɛyɛ me anaa?” Yesu buaa no se, “Yiw.”

26.verse: Awurade adidi - Bere a wɔredidi no, Yesu faa abodoo, na ɔhyiraa so bubuu mu, de maa n’asuafo no kae se, “Munnye nni, eyi ne me nipadua.”

27.verse: Na ɔfaa kuruwa a nsa dɔkɔdɔkɔ wɔ mu, na ɔdaa ase no, ɔde maa wɔn kae se, “Mo nyinaa monnom bi,

28.verse: na eyi ne me mogya a ɛhyɛ Apam Foforo no mu den. Wohwie gu ma nnipa bebree nya bɔne fafiri.

29.verse: Montie nea mereka yi yiye. Merennom saa nsa yi bi bio da, de bɛkɔ akosi da a me ne mo bɛnom bi bio wɔ m’agya Ahenni no mu.”

30.verse: Na wɔtoo dwom wiei no, wofii adi kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔw no so.

31.verse: Yesu hyɛ Petro pa a ɔbɛpa no no ho nkɔm - Woduu nea wɔrekɔ hɔ no, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Anadwo yi, mo nyinaa beguan agya me. Na wɔakyerɛw sɛ, ‘Onyankopɔn bɛbɔ oguanhwɛfo no, na nguankuw no abɔ apete.’

32.verse: Na sɛ mesan ba nkwa mu bio a, mɛkɔ Galilea na makohyia mo wɔ hɔ.”

33.verse: Petro ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Sɛ nnipa nyinaa beguan agya wo a, me de, merenguan nnya wo da.”

34.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Nokwarem, anadwo yi, akokɔ remmɔn, na woapa me mpɛn abiɛsa!”

35.verse: Petro kae bio se, “Medi kan mawu!” Asuafo no nyinaa nso kaa saa asɛm koro yi ara.

36.verse: Yesu bɔ mpae wɔ Getsemane - Yesu de wɔn kɔɔ baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Getsemane. Woduu hɔ no, ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, wɔntena hɔ ntwɛn no, na ɔrekɔ n’anim akɔbɔ mpae.

37.verse: Ɔfaa Petro ne Sebedeo mma baanu a wɔn din de Yakobo ne Yohane kaa ne ho. Ne werɛ fii ase howee na ne ho nso yeraw no.

38.verse: Ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Awerɛhow ahyɛ me kra so de kɔ owu mu. Montena ha na mo ne me nwɛn.”

39.verse: Na ɔkɔɔ n’anim kakra de n’anim kobutuw fam bɔɔ mpae se, “Magya, sɛ ebetumi a, ma kuruwa yi ntwa me ho nkɔ. Nanso, nea wopɛ na ɛnyɛ, na ɛnyɛ nea mepɛ.”

40.verse: Na ɔsan baa asuafo baasa no nkyɛn behui sɛ wɔadeda. Ɔfrɛɛ Petro bisaa no se, “Petro, woantumi antena ase ne me anwɛn dɔnhwerew baako mpo?

41.verse: Monwɛn na mommɔ mpae, na moankɔ sɔhwɛ mu. Honhom pɛ de, nanso, ɔhonam yɛ mmerɛw!”

42.verse: Ɔsan gyaw wɔn hɔ bio kɔbɔɔ mpae bio se, “M’agya, sɛ kuruwa yi rentwa me ho nkɔ, na nom ara na ɛsɛ sɛ menom nea ɛwɔ mu no a, nea wopɛ nyɛ.”

43.verse: Ɔsan baa wɔn nkyɛn bio, behui sɛ wɔadeda efisɛ, na wɔn ani kum yiye.

44.verse: Ɔsan kɔɔ mpaebɔ a ɛto so mpɛn abiɛsa so, kɔbɔɔ mpae, kaa asɛm koro no ara.

45.verse: Ɔsan baa asuafo no nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Afei de, monna, na monhome. Nanso, dɔn no adu. Wɔrebeyi Onipa Ba no ahyɛ nnebɔneyɛfo nsa!

46.verse: Monsɔre na yɛnkɔ! Monhwɛ! Nea ɔreyi me ama no na ɔreba no!

47.verse: Wɔkyere Yesu - Ogu so rekasa no, Yuda a ɔyɛ asuafo dumien no mu baako ne dɔm a Yudafo mpanyin asoma wɔn, a wokitakita nkrante ne mmaa baa hɔ.

48.verse: Na Yuda aka akyerɛ wɔn se, wɔnkyere onipa a ɔbɛyɛ no atuu no, efisɛ, ɔno ne onipa a wɔrehwehwɛ no no.

49.verse: Yuda baa Yesu nkyɛn bɛbam no kae se, “Me Wura, atuu!”

50.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Damfo, nea wobaa ha sɛ worebɛyɛ no, yɛ no ntɛm.” Ɛhɔ ara, wɔn a wɔne Yuda nam no kyeree Yesu.

51.verse: Wɔn a wɔka Yesu ho no mu baako twee ne nkrante de twaa ɔsɔfo panyin no akoa bi aso.

52.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Tow wo nkrante no kyene. Na wɔn a wɔtwe nkrante no, nkrante ano na wobewu.

53.verse: Munnim sɛ metumi aka akyerɛ m’agya na wasoma n’abɔfompempem aba ntɛm so, na wɔabɛbɔ yɛn ho ban?

54.verse: Nanso, sɛ meyɛ saa a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na nea Kyerɛwsɛm ka wɔ nea asi yi ho no bɛba mu?”

55.verse: Yesu bisaa dɔm a wɔbaa ne so no se, “Meyɛ owudifo nti na mode nkrante ne mmaa aba me so sɛ mode rebɛkyere me? Metenaa mo nkyɛn kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔ Asɔrefi da biara da nso moansiw me kwan.

56.verse: Nanso, eyi nyinaa aba sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, nea adiyifo no kae wɔ Kyerɛwsɛm mu no bɛba mu.”Saa bere no ara mu na asuafo no nyinaa guan gyaa no.

57.verse: Yesu gyina Kaiafa anim - Afei dɔm a wɔkyeree Yesu no de no kɔɔ ɔsɔfo panyin Kaiafa anim, faako a Yudafo mpanyin nyinaa ahyia hɔ.

58.verse: Petro tew ne ho dii nnipadɔm no akyi kɔɔ ɔsɔfo panyin no fi hɔ bi. Ɔkɔtenaa asomfo a wɔwɔ hɔ no mu sɛ ɔrehwɛ asɛm a ebesi.

59.verse: Asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo asennifo akunini nyinaa hyiae wɔ hɔ, hwehwɛe sɛ wobenya adansefo bi a wobedi adansekurum ato Yesu so, na wɔagyina so abu no kumfɔ.

60.verse: Nnipa bebree bedii adanse, nanso wohui sɛ wɔredi adansekurum efisɛ, na wɔn nsɛm a wɔka no nyinaa bɔ abira.Akyiri yi, nnipa baanu bi ba bɛkae

61.verse: se, “Saa onipa yi kae se, ‘Metumi abubu Onyankopɔn Asɔredan na masi no nnansa!’ “

62.verse: Ɔsɔfo panyin no sɔre bisaa Yesu se, “Dɛn na wowɔ ka? Wokaa saa anaasɛ woanka saa?”

63.verse: Nanso, Yesu ammua no. Ɔsɔfo panyin no ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Meka Onyankopɔn teasefo no sɛ, sɛ wone Agyenkwa no, Onyankopɔn Ba no a, ka kyerɛ yɛn!”

64.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Yiw, woaka. Na daakye mubehu me, Agyenkwa no, sɛ mete Onyankopɔn nifa, na menam omununkum mu resian aba.”

65.verse: Ɔsɔfo panyin no sunsuanee n’atade mu teɛɛm se, “Abususɛm! Adansefo bɛn na wɔn ho hia yɛn bio? Mo nyinaa ate abususɛm a ɔkae no!

66.verse: Asɛm bɛn na mowɔ ka?” Wɔn nyinaa teɛɛm se, “Ɔsɛ owu! Ɔsɛ owu! Ɔsɛ owu!”

67.verse: Afei wɔtew ntasu guu n’ani so, ebinom bobɔɔ no akuturuku, na ebinom nso bobɔɔ no asotɔre

68.verse: kae se, “Wone Agyenkwa no! Kyerɛ yɛn nea ɔbɔɔ wo?”

69.verse: Petro pa Yesu - Saa bere no na Petro te adiwo. Abeawa bi baa ne nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Wo nso na wo ne Yesu na ɛnam. Mo nyinaa mufi Galilea.”

70.verse: Nanso, Petro de abufuw san n’ano se, “Minnim nea woreka yi ho hwee.”

71.verse: Akyiri yi, abeawa foforo bi hyiaa no ɔpon bi ano ka kyerɛɛ wɔn a ɔne wɔn gyina hɔ no se, “Na saa ɔbarima yi ne Yesu Nasaretni no na ɛnam.”

72.verse: Petro de ntam san n’ano bio se, “Minnim saa onipa a moreka ne ho asɛm no.”

73.verse: Ɛkyɛɛ kakra no, mmarima a wogyina hɔ no mu bi bɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Yenim sɛ woyɛ n’asuafo no mu baako na wo kasa nso yi wo adi sɛ woyɛ Galileani.”

74.verse: Petro fii ase dii nsew, kekaa ntam se, “Minnim onipa no. Sɛ nkontompo na meretwa a, Onyankopɔn ntua me so ka.” Amonom hɔ ara, na akokɔ bɔnee.

75.verse: Ɛhɔ na Petro kaee asɛm a Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no se, “Akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mpɛn abiɛsa” no. Na ofii adi kosui.

1.verse: Wɔde Yesu kɔ Pilato anim - Ade kyee no, asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin kɔɔ agyina hwehwɛɛ ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa so ama Roma aban abu Yesu kumfɔ.

2.verse: Afei wɔde nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn guu Yesu, de no baa Pilato a ɔyɛ Roma amrado no anim.

3.verse: Yuda ahonu - Saa bere no ara mu, Yuda a oyii Yesu mae no hui sɛ wɔabu Yesu kumfɔ no, onuu ne ho yiye. Enti ɔsan de sika a ogye fii asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin no nkyɛn no brɛɛ wɔn kae se,

4.verse: “Mayɛ bɔne, efisɛ, mayi onipa a ɔnyɛɛ bɔne biara ama.” Wɔn nso kae se, “Ɛmfa yɛn ho. Wo ara w’asɛm.”

5.verse: Ɔtow sika no guu asɔredan no mu fii hɔ kɔhyɛɛ hama.

6.verse: Asɔfo mpanyin no sesaw sika no kae se, “Yɛrentumi mfa saa sika yi mfra yɛn tow a yɛagye mu. Efisɛ, yɛn mmara mma ho kwan sɛ yebegye sika a wɔde abɔ awudi ho paa.”

7.verse: Wodwinnwen ho sii no gyinae sɛ wɔde sika no bɛtɔ asase bi a wotu hɔ dɔte de nwene nkuku, na wɔde ɛhɔ ayɛ amusiei ama ahɔho a wobewu wɔ Yerusalem no.

8.verse: Enti na wɔda so frɛ saa asase no se, “Mogya asase” de besi nnɛ no.

9.verse: Eyi maa nea odiyifo Yeremia kae se, “Wogyee nnwetɛbona aduasa, bo a Israelfo sesee sɛ odi

10.verse: ɛnna wofi mu tɔɔ asase fii anwemfo nkyɛn sɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ me” no baa mu.

11.verse: Yesu gyina Pilato anim - Afei wɔde Yesu begyinaa Pilato a ɔyɛ Roma Amrado no anim. Obisaa Yesu se, “Wone Yudafo Agyenkwa no anaa?” Yesu buae se, “Yiw.”

12.verse: Nanso, bere a asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin reka nsɛm gu Yesu so no, wankasa.

13.verse: Pilato bisaa no se, “Wonte nea wɔreka no anaa?”

14.verse: Nanso, Yesu anka hwee ma ɛyɛɛ amrado no nwonwa.

15.verse: Wobu Yesu kumfɔ - Na ɛyɛ amrado no amanne sɛ afe biara, Twam Afahyɛ no mu, ogyaa odeduani baako a ɔman no pɛ sɛ wogyaa no.

16.verse: Saa afe no mu, na onipa debɔneyɛfo bi a wɔfrɛ no Baraba nso da afiase.

17.verse: Anɔpa no a nnipadɔm no hyiaa wɔ Pilato ahemfi anim hɔ no, Pilato bisaa wɔn se, “Hena na mopɛ sɛ migyaa no ma mo? Baraba, anaa Yesu, mo Agyenkwa no?”

18.verse: Na onim pefee sɛ Yudafo mpanyin no de ɔtan na akyere Yesu, efisɛ, na w’agye din.

19.verse: Pilato gu so redi Yesu asɛm no, ne yere soma ma wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ no se, “Gyaa onipa trenee no na ɔnkɔ ne baabi, efisɛ, anadwo yi mesoo ne ho dae a ɛyɛ hu yiye maa me ho yeraw me.”

20.verse: Nanso asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin kasa kyerɛɛ dɔm no se, wommisa na wonnyaa Baraba mma wɔn na wonkum Yesu.

21.verse: Enti, bere a amrado no san bisaa wɔn bio se, “Nnipa baanu yi mu hena na mopɛ sɛ migyaa no ma mo?” no, dɔm no bɔ gyee so se, “Baraba!”

22.verse: Pilato bisaa wɔn bio se, “Sɛ saa de a, ɛnne dɛn na menyɛ Yesu, mo Agyenkwa no?” Wɔn nyinaa bɔ gyee so bio se, “Bɔ no asennuam!”

23.verse: Pilato bisaa wɔn se, “Adɛn nti? Bɔne bɛn na wayɛ?” Nanso, wɔkɔɔ so bɔ gyeee so ara se, “Bɔ no asennuam! Bɔ no asennuam!”

24.verse: Afei Pilato hui sɛ ɔyɛ asɛm no ho hwee a ɛnyɛ ye na basabasayɛ reba no, ɔma wɔsaw nsu guu ade mu brɛɛ no, ma ɔhohoroo ne nsa wɔ dɔm no anim kae se, “Minni saa onipa trenee yi mogya ho fɔ. Nea ɛbɛba biara no yɛ mo asɛm!”

25.verse: Nnipadɔm no san bɔ gyee so bio se, “Ne mogya mmegu yɛn ne yɛn mma tiri so.”

26.verse: Afei, Pilato yii Baraba fii afiase hɔ de no maa wɔn. Ɔbɔɔ Yesu mmaa wiei no, ɔde no maa Roma asraafo no sɛ wɔmfa no nkɔ nkɔbɔ no asennuam.

27.verse: Yesu ho fɛwdi - Asraafo no de Yesu kɔɔ amrado aban mu hɔ ɛnna wɔfrɛɛ asraafodɔm baa hɔ.

28.verse: Woyii Yesu atade a na ɛhyɛ no no de batakari kɔkɔɔ bi hyɛɛ no,

29.verse: ɛnna wɔde nsɔe atenten nwenee kyɛw hyɛɛ no, ɛnna wɔde dua bi hyɛɛ ne nsa nifa sɛ ahempoma, ɛnna wobubuu nkotodwe wɔ n’anim fitii ase, bɔ gyee so, dii ne ho fɛw se, “Yudafo Hene, wo nkwa so.”

30.verse: Wɔtetew ntasu guu ne so, na wogyee dua no fii ne nsam, de paa ne mpampam.

31.verse: Wodii ne ho fɛw wiei no, wɔworɔw batakari kɔkɔɔ a wɔde hyɛɛ no no, de n’ankasa n’atade no san hyɛɛ no bio. Afei, wɔde no kɔe sɛ wɔrekɔbɔ no asennuam.

32.verse: Bere a wɔde no rekɔ faako a wɔbɔ asennuam hɔ no, wohyiaa ɔbarima bi a wɔfrɛɛ no Simon a ofi Kirene a ɛwɔ Abibirim. Wɔhyɛɛ no ma ɔsoaa Yesu asennua no bi.

33.verse: Wɔbɔ Yesu asɛnnuam - Wɔde Yesu kɔɔ baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ se Golgota a n’asekyerɛ ne “Nitiri So.”

34.verse: Ɛhɔ na asraafo no maa no nsa nwenenwene bi sɛ ɔnnom. Yesu kaa n’ano no, wannom.

35.verse: Afei wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnuam. Ɛno akyi, wɔbɔɔ n’atade no so ntonto kyekyɛ fae.

36.verse: Afei, wɔn nyinaa tenatenaa ase, wɛn no.

37.verse: Wɔkyerɛw nsɛm a wɔka guu ne so no bi fam n’atifi se, “Yesu, Yudafo Hene no ni.”

38.verse: Da no ara anɔpa, wɔbɔɔ awudifo baanu bi asɛnnuam kaa Yesu ho. Na ɔbaako sɛn ne nifa so ɛnna ɔbaako nso sɛn ne benkum so.

39.verse: Wodi Yesu a ɔsɛn hɔ no ho fɛw - Nnipa a wotwaam faa faako a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnuam hɔ no nyinaa wosow wɔn ti, dii Yesu ho fɛw se,

40.verse: “Ɛnyɛ wo na wuse wubetumi abubu asɔredan na wode nnansa asi no? Sɛ wo na wuse woyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba ampa ara a, ɛnne sian fi asɛnnua no so si fam na yɛnhwɛ ɛ!”

41.verse: Saa ara nso na asɔfo mpanyin ne Yudafo mpanyin bɛdii ne ho fɛw se,

42.verse: “Ogye afoforo, nanso ontumi nnye ne ho! Sɛ wone Israelfo hene no ampa ara a, sian fi asɛnnua no so si fam na yennye wo nni.

43.verse: Ɔde ne ho too Onyankopɔn so. Afei, ma Onyankopɔn nnye no! Wanka nso se, ‘Meyɛ Onyankopɔn Ba?’ “

44.verse: Awudifo bi a wɔbɔɔ wɔne no asennuam no nso fitii ase dii ne ho fɛw.

45.verse: Yesu wu - Bere a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnuam no, sum duruu asase so mmaa nyinaa fi owigyinae kɔpem nnɔn abiɛsa.

46.verse: Ɛbɛyɛ nnɔn abiɛsa bere mu no, Yesu teɛɛm dennen se, “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” Ase kyerɛ sɛ, “Me Nyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woagyaw me?”

47.verse: Wɔn a wogyina hɔ no bi ante ase susuwii sɛ ɔrefrɛ Elia.

48.verse: Wɔn mu baako tuu mmirika kɔfaa sapɔw bi de bɔɔ nsa nwenenwene bi mu, de tuaa dua bi ano de brɛɛ Yesu sɛ ɔnnom.

49.verse: Nanso, nnipa no nkae no kae se, “Gyaa no na yɛnhwɛ sɛ Elia bɛba abegye no anaa.”

50.verse: Afei, Yesu teɛɛm dennen bio, gyaa ne honhom mu wui.

51.verse: Ɛhɔ ara, ntama a etwa asɔredan no mu Kronkron mu Kronkron no mu suanee abien fi soro kosii fam. Asase wosowee. Abotan mu paapaee.

52.verse: Adamoa so buebuei, maa atreneefo a wɔawuwu nyannyanee.

53.verse: Yesu wusɔre akyi no, wofifii wɔn adamoa mu kɔɔ Yerusalem, koyii wɔn ho adi kyerɛɛ nnipa bebree.

54.verse: Asraafo a wɔwɔ hɔ no huu asasewosow ne nsɛm a esisii hɔ no, wɔn koma tui yiye ma wɔkae se, “Ampa ara, onipa yi yɛ Onyankopɔn Ba.”

55.verse: Saa bere no na mmea bebree a Yesu ho dɔ nti wodii n’akyi fi Galilea no gyinagyina akyiri baabi rehwɛ nea ɛrekɔ so.

56.verse: Mmea no bi ne Maria Magdalene ne Maria a ɔyɛ Yakobo, Yohane ne Yosef wɔn na. Na Sebedeo mma Yakobo ne Yohane nso wɔn na ka wɔn ho.

57.verse: Wosie Yesu - Eduu anwummere no, osikani bi a wɔfrɛ no Yosef a ofi Arimatea a na ɔyɛ Yesu kyidini no,

58.verse: kɔɔ Pilato hɔ kɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmfa Yesu amu no mma no.

59.verse: Yosef faa amu no de nwera kyekyeree ho,

60.verse: na ɔde no kɔtoo ɔno ankasa ne boda foforo bi a watwa mu, pirew ɔbo kɛse bi hinii ano, ansa na ɔregyaw hɔ akɔ.

61.verse: Maria Magdalene ne Maria baako no de, na wɔte nkyɛn baabi rewɛn ɔboda no.

62.verse: Wɔwɛn ɔboda no - Ade kyee a ɛyɛ da a edi Twam Afahyɛ no ahosieisie akyi no, asɔfo mpanyin ne Farisifo no kɔɔ Pilato nkyɛn,

63.verse: kɔka kyerɛɛ no se, “Owura, ɔtorofo no kae bere bi se, ‘Nnansa akyi no, mɛsan aba nkwa mu bio.’

64.verse: Eyi nti ma yɛn kwan na yɛnkɔtare ɔda no ano nkosi nnansa sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a n’asuafo no rentwa wɔn ho nkowia amu no mmɔ no dawuru se wasɔre afi awufo mu. Na sɛ ɛkɔba saa de a, anka akyiri yi nnaadaa bɛsen kan de no.”

65.verse: Pilato ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Mowɔ awɛmfo. Momma wɔnkɔwɛn.”

66.verse: Enti, wɔkɔtaree ɔboda no ano, maa awɛmfo kɔwɛnee sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, obiara rentumi nkowura hɔ nkowia amu no.

1.verse: Owusɔre - Homeda a ɛyɛ Kwasida ahemadakye, Maria Magdalene ne Maria baako no kɔɔ ɛda no so.

2.verse: Amonom, asase wosowee dennen; na Awurade bɔfo sian fi soro bae, bepirew ɔbo no fii ɛda no ano, na ɔtenaa so.

3.verse: N’anim hyerɛn te sɛ kanea na n’atade yɛ fitaa te sɛ nwera.

4.verse: Awɛmfo no huu no no, ehu maa wɔn ho popoe, na wɔhwehwee ase, danee sɛ awufo.

5.verse: Ɔbɔfo no ka kyerɛɛ mmea no se, “Munnsuro! Minim sɛ, morehwehwɛ Yesu a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnuam no,

6.verse: nanso, onni ha. Wasɔre kɔ sɛnea ɔkae no. Mommra mmɛhwɛ nea na ɔda hɔ no.

7.verse: Afei monkɔ ntɛm nkɔka nkyerɛ n’asuafo no se, ‘Wasɔre afi awufo mu, na ɔredi mo anim kan akɔ Galilea akohyia mo wɔ hɔ.’ Eyi ne nkra a mewɔ de ma mo.”

8.verse: Mmea no de hu ne anigye a adi afra tutuu mmirika fii ɛda no so sɛ, wɔrekɔhwehwɛ asuafo no aka ɔbɔfo no nkra no akyerɛ wɔn.

9.verse: Wɔrekɔ no, prɛko pɛ, Yesu begyinaa wɔn anim. Okyiaa wɔn se, “Asomdwoe nka mo.” Wobuu no nkotodwe, som no.

10.verse: Afei, Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn se, “Munnsuro! Monkɔ nkɔka nkyerɛ me nuanom no se, wɔnkɔ Galilea nkohyia me wɔ hɔ.”

11.verse: Nea awɛmfo no kae - Bere a mmea no rekɔ kurow no mu no, awɛmfo a wɔwɛn ɛda no mu bi kɔɔ asɔfo mpanyin no nkyɛn kɔkaa nea asi no nyinaa kyerɛɛ wɔn.

12.verse: Yudafo mpanyin no nyinaa hyiae, na wosii no gyinae sɛ, wɔbɛma awɛmfo no sika aka akyerɛ wɔn

13.verse: se, “Monka se, ‘Anadwo a yɛdae no, na n’asuafo no ba bewiaa amu no de kɔe.’ “

14.verse: Wɔhyɛɛ awɛmfo no bɔ sɛ, “Sɛ ɛba sɛ amrado te ɛho asɛm a, yɛbɛkyerɛkyerɛ no mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, ɔrenyɛ mo hwee.”

15.verse: Eyi nti, awɛmfo no gyee sika no kɔyɛɛ sɛnea wɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ wɔnyɛ no. Asɛm a wɔkae no trɛw faa Yudafo no mu nyinaa na wogye di de besi nnɛ.

16.verse: Yesu yi ne ho adi kyerɛ n’asuafo no - Afei, asuafo dubaako no siim kɔɔ Galilea bepɔw a Yesu kae se wobehu no wɔ so no so.

17.verse: Ɛhɔ na wohuu no, kotow, sɔree no. Nan so, na wɔn mu bi nnye nni sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu.

18.verse: Yesu ka kyerɛɛ n’asuafo no se, “Wɔde ɔsoro ne asase so tumi nyinaa ama me.

19.verse: Enti monkɔ nkɔyɛ amanaman nyinaa m’asuafo. Mommɔ wɔn asu nhyɛ Agya, Ɔba ne Honhom Kronkron din mu,

20.verse: na monkyerɛkyerɛ wɔn se, wonni nea mahyɛ mo no nyinaa so. Na me ne mo wɔ hɔ nna nyinaa de bɛkɔ akosi wiase awiei.”
